title: Congratulations to Lynn and Tavit
content:
My daughter and her husband just got a nice newspaper write up about their great uke programs. Good news! Nice to read good news.

Fancy Nancy Says: Papers should include more good news.

title: Enjoying Teaching and tutoring
content:
I am now teaching three days a week and learning from my young students, ages 5,7 and 9. That is the wonderful part of teaching. You learn from your students and they learn from you.

Happy 2016. When you do what you enjoy you will succeed.

Fancy Nancy Says: Work can be fun.

title: Happy 2016
content:
Here comes the New Year. Hope we all enjoy good health, that is No.1. Hope the world gets more secure. Enjoy the blessings you now have. Have a wonderful New Year.

Fancy Nancy Says: Enjoy each new day.

title: Happy Holidays to all
content:
Hope you are having a wonderful holiday season. Enjoy your family and friends and take the time to relax as well. Sending good wishes.

Fancy Nancy Says: Enjoy each day and don't worry about tomorrow.

title: Computers can be frustrating
content:
Trying to get my computer to remove automatic updates has got me baffled. The store gave me instructions, but they are not working. Do you find your computers can get  you frustrated?


Fancy Nancy Says: At times my computer is a pain.

title: New Student Today
content:
Today I met with a new student. I hope I helped her and she helped me with an eye problem. We do learn from each other. That is why I love teaching.

Fancy Nancy Says:
Teachers learn from students.

title: Teaching again  and enjoying Fl
content:
We are back in Fl and after getting settled, I am looking forward to teaching again. Weather is lovely and nice to be settled. Moving can be a pain.

Fancy Nancy Says: Moving is a lot of work.

title: Relocating Soon
content:
It is time to relocate to warmer weather. I don't like the cold. Warm is nice in the winter. Packing up and nearly done.

Fancy Nancy Says: Fall is fun, but winter is too cold up north. Fly south with the birds. They know best.

title: My Hat Is a Hit in Newport
content:
Today it was quite cold and I wore my Sponge Bob  knitted hat to keep warm. It was a hit in Newport, R.I. Many people stopped me to say they liked my hat and one women from Texas asked if she could take my picture. I also have a bunny hat which is even warmer and that has a scarf and gloves attached. That hat is always a hit when I wear it.

Fancy Nancy Says: Fun hats make people say Hi!

title: It is Getting Cold in New England
content:
No snow, but time to put on mittens, winter coat, and warm hat.  Trying to finish medical apts. before relocation. As we age our bodies need more work and more help. Just finished cataract surgery. Wow, I can see again. Great procedure and it does make a big difference.

Fancy Nancy Says: Medicine has come a long way.

title: Wonderful Time to Swim
content:
Today I was allowed to swim again after eye surgery. It felt great! I really miss the exercise when I am unable to swim. We look forward to relocating soon. Trying to finish up medical apts. Rainy and then sunny in the afternoon.

Fancy Nancy Says: You never know the weather in New England

title: Back to the Blog
content:
H i Sorry I had to take a break as I had eye surgery. All is well and I am glad it is over. A wonderful surgeon at Mass. Eye. It pays to research your surgeon.

Fancy Nancy Says: Before surgery, interview your surgeon

title: Stomach Issues
content:
Just saw the doctor after a tough night with stomach pain. Perhaps I ate something that did not agree with me. Glad I saw the doctor even though I did not have an apt. Went to his office and waited until he saw me. Sometimes you have to do that.

Fancy Nancy Says: Sometimes it pays to just go to the office and wait. Otherwise they will not see you.

title: Teaching is done at the libraries
content:
I enjoyed doing three programs at the libraries. They went well. I had to cancel my Sept. program since I have to have cataract surgery. I will be glad when it is over.

Fancy Nancy Says; Surgery is not fun, but needed.

title: Summer is going quickly
content:
Working on fixing up the house. Met a nice young man at Home Depot and he did a great job doing repairs. Home Depot is a good place to find folks to fix what is broken.

Fancy Nancy Says: If you need someone to fix things, you can find people to help at Home Depot.

title: BOOKS ON HEARING LOSS
content: I  have many copies of my book HEARING LOSS AND WINNING SOLUTIONS.  If anyone wants a copy it is yours, but all I would need is the postage to ship it to you. The book has good information for you and your loved ones to help them with hearing loss issues. Send me your mailing address and the price of postage and handling, $5 and the book is yours. The book sells for $15, but no charge to you since I have just some copies left to share. Let me know if you want any? Once I hear from you, I will send the mailing information. Fancy Nancy

title: Writing Class Ended Today
content:
Just completed a second library writing class. The students all bonded and wanted more. They were a delightful group. Went swimming. It really helps aches and pains.

Fancy Nancy Says: Swim your pains away.

title: A Medical Week
content:
This past week it seems my body fell apart. Not one part but several parts. I hope now it is pasted back together. It seems as you get older the body needs more patching.

Fancy Nancy Says: Tell your body to behave!

title: Dealing with some medical issues
content:
Interviewing eye surgeons for cataract surgery. I may have found one I like. It takes time to discover who you want to work with for surgery. 


Fancy Nancy Says: Interview your doctors. It pays off.

title: Great time with family and friends
content:
Visited my son . He is a wonderful host and entertains all the time. We had a great time seeing him and many of his friends.

Fancy Nancy Says: I am lucky to have a wonderful family.

title: Interviewing doctors and leaving for the Bershires
content:
This weekend we will go to the Berkshires . It is a lovely area and very scenic. I am still interviewing surgeons . Eventually I will find one I like. Keep looking if you are not sure.

Fancy Nancy Says; Take your time to find the right surgeon. You don't want a mistake.

title: Fun Class
content:
Today I met with my Life Story Writing class. A lovely group and I learned from them. I am lucky to be able to still teach. You need to find things in your life you really enjoy. I do love teaching.

Fancy Nancy Says: Do what  you love and you will do it well.

title: A Trip to Watch Hill
content:
Today was a cloudy day. We went to Watch Hill. It used to be very fancy. Many of the old shops are gone. It was very windy. They have a famous carousel there.

Fancy Nancy Says; Time marches on  and things do change.

title: Back online with Google Chrome
content:
It took some time, but I finally found a way to keep my blog going. Today was busy with a fun painting time, swimming, and getting ready to teach again on Wed. The time has gone quickly since we returned up north.


Fancy Nancy Says: As you get older time flies.

title: Happy Father's Day to all the dads
content:
Fathers are special. They are the stabilizers in most families. My dad was often working. When he told us to do something , we did not question him. Today it is different. Often the dads are involved in more sharing. Years ago the moms did most of the child care .

Fancy Nancy Says: I think it is good that fathers are now more involved in the child care.

title: I just found a site that works
content:
I have been trying for days to find my site online. It would not work on AOL. It does work on Google Chrome. What a time I have had since I did not know who to keep my blog going. Thanks for hanging in there. Fancy Nancy is back online.

Fancy Nancy Says: If you can't succeed, keep trying till you can!

title: Computer Problems with AOL E-mail
content:
Just sent Lynn and Richard e-mails and they won't work. Aol continues to have problems.

Fancy Nancy Says: AOL needs help.

title: Getting Ready to Relocate
content:
Time to pack up. We are relocating next week. We have had a good season in Florida. We do not miss snow and the winter.

Fancy Nancy Says: We are taking the sun to Rhode Island

title: Fun tutoring today
content:
Met my twin boys today to tutor them to read. They are fun and I have them some surprises.

Fancy Nancy Says: It is fun to tutor.

title: Lunch with Movie Club
content:
We used to have a movie club and so today the ladies met from the former club to say hi to a member who lost her husband. It was nice to connect and I think she was happy to see all of us.
Fancy Nancy Says: Keeping in touch with friends is important.

title: It is hot in Florida now
content:
Well it is cold up north but very hot in Florida. We are getting ready to relocate. I am enjoying a new senior center where they offer all kinds of courses. I think it is great that they have such facilities.

Fancy Nancy Says: If you are a senior try our senior center. They offer lots of good courses.

title: Folds are Leaving Florida
content:
Many are leaving for the season and returning up north. Things are winding down. It is getting hot here now. We will all reconnect with our up north families soon.
Fancy Nancy Says: Florida winter camp is nearly over. Back to reality soon.

title: Wow, the market took a real hit today
content:
Just read the stock market report. Today it took a big hit. What goes up can also go down.

Fancy Nancy Says: The stock market can be a roller coaster ride.

title: It is Getting Hot in Florida
content:
The days are getting hotter. We are getting ready to relocate up north. It is   had a good winter here. Up north they had it tough.

Fancy Nancy Says: Good weather makes you feel better.

title: Nice Class Today
content:
My computer is still having problems, but I am trying to work in spite of the problems. Nice class today with two interesting students. We have a busy week with company coming on several days.

Fancy Nancy Says: Enjoy your company, but pace yourself with them.

title: Every Day Is a New Adventure
content:
Felt fine this morning but did not feel good this afternoon. Had to cancel company. Started to feel better after taking some medicine. One day at a time. One never knows what the new day will bring.

Fancy Nancy Says: Life can change each day. We need to be flexible and adapt.

title: Comoputers Are Frustrating
content:
I have spent most of this week trying to get my computer to work. The store said they fixed it and put in a new program, but it still is not right. I will need to find another service that does better work. It upsets me when I do not have access to my E-mails. Today was not my best day. Students who were scheduled never arrived and never called to cancel. Hope tomorrow will be a better day. One day at a time.

Fancy Nancy Says: Some days do not go smoothly.

title: Computers are Great When They Work
content:
My computer has been having problems again. When they work they are great. When they do not work, they are a pain! Tomorrow I have to go back to the computer store again to have them update the system.

Fancy Nancy Says: What did we do when we did not have computers? Answer , We had time for other activities.

title: Confusing Day with Wells Fargo Bank
content:
I think Wells Fargo Bank needs better help. I have been waiting for a new credit card for two months and so far it has not arrived. When I go to complain they pass the buck and no one follow through. Where does the buck stop? Perhaps I should write to the President of the bank. Maybe he can get through the maze of exceuses they give to the customer.

Fancy Nancy Says: Many of the banks needs help. They forgot about the customers' needs.

title: Delightfull Student Today
content:
I am lucky to have some wonderful students. That makes teaching fun. You are lucky when you like your work.

Fancy Nancy Says: Enjoy your job otherwise, find one you like.

title: Saturday Teaching Day
content:
I am enjoying teaching 3 youngsters to read. I give them fun things to do and at the end they get a surprise. Anything to encourage reading which is so important. As I get older I read more than ever. Not much good stuff on TV.

Fancy Nancy Says: Reading can take you anywhere you want to go. You never have to leave your chair.

title: My computer works again.
content:
I often have problems with my computer. I just brought it in to update the systems. I do miss is wheen I don't have it. Had a lovely student today. She is writing about her life when she had to leave Cuba. Teaching students from all over is fun.

Fancy Nancy Says; Enjoy your work. Pick something you like to do. Why not?

title: Fun at Good Will
content:
Tonight it was very cold and we went to a fun Good Will. It is an adventure and I got some very good teaching materials for some of my young students. You never know what  you will find at a Good Will.

Fnacy Nancy Says: Junk shops often have good stuff.

title: Fun Student Day
content:
Had a good class and enjoyed my studnet. My program on India had to be changed since the schedule would not work for the girl from India. Trying to suggest an alternate program

Fancy Nancy Says: You have to be flexible in this life to adjust to what takes place.

title: Company from Rhode Island
content:
Today we had guests from Rhode Island. They are very glad to be in Florida since the Rhode Island weather is tough. Lots of snow. Naples is a lovely place in the winter.

Fancy Nancy Says: I am glad not to be in the snow.

title: Teahing New Students is fun
content:
I am enjoying my teaching and I love it when I have students from other countries. What a treat. Don't have to travel aroung the world, they come to Florida.

Fancy Nancy Says:
Enjoy your work. Why not! I love my teaching

title: Fun students
content:
Today I had two students. One was from Scotland and the other from Canada. It is fun to have studnets from different countries. I learn about life in other places.


Fancy Nancy Says: I am lucky to love teaching.

title: Teaching and Nice Weekend
content:
Today I had a new student and I am teaching him Speed Reading. Always fun to meet studnets from difference countries. Still cool here , but much better than up north.

Fancy Nancy Says: I do not miss the snow , ice and cold weather.

title: Good Time to Buy Canadian Dollars
content:
Now is the itme to buy Canadian dollars and get a good return on US dollars. You could enjoy good discounts in Canada or wait until the exchange reverses. I did a small exchange today and maybe I will go to Canada this summer. Time will tell.

Famcy Nancy Says: Currency exchange is interesting. Watch it!

title: A Good Day
content:
Love to get a massage. It is really great for the skin and the body . I have a wonderful Russian massage therapist. She is excellent and a lovely lady. Saw the ear doctor as well.

Fancy Nancy Says: You have to take care of the body. It is the only one you have.

title: A Great Weekend with Family
content:
Had a wonderful weekend with famiy on the East Coast. Had dinner with my daugher and her family and then connected with my 91 year young cousin. He and his wife a model seniors. You would never know their age. They are both very activley involved with life , with people and with projects.

Fancy Nancy Says: Keeping active is keeping young.

title: Busy Week
content:
We had a nce visit with family this week. Always fun times when we have visitors in Florida. Weather has been colder though. Classes I take and teach are fun. I like to teach and learn as well.

Fancy Nancy Says: Never stop learning. There is so much to learn about that you do not know. Happy 2015

title: Cold, Crisp Florida Day
content:
It was cold in Florida today. I am wearing my winter jacket. Saw a movie at the Library. Jasmine, a 2013 flick. The library does many nice free programs. I teach at three libraries in Rhode Island and the programs they offer in all the libraries are excellent.

Fancy Nancy Says: The library system in the United States is one of the best examples of aa democarcy in actioin.

title: Fun Friday
content:
Today I had my Physical Therapy. The girls are just great who work with all kinds of patients. I admire the work that the threapists do with all kinds of issues. It is wonderful that people can have physical therapy to help them heal medical issues.

Fancy Nancy Says: Physical Therapy is a great field for young people to get into. There will always be a job.

title: Jan. 1, 2015
content:
Hi and Happy New Year. Hope this year brings good health and good times. Looking forward to hearing from you  and enjoying the Florida weather. Just met the new neighbors. They are from Boston. Many new young people now buying in Florida before they retire. Not a bad idea. Why not!

Fancy Nancy Says: Don't let life pass you by. Happy 2015. Enjoy each day and appreciate the beauty in life.

title: Happy Holidays to All
content:
Hope you are all enjoying the holidays season. We are enjoying some lovelly Florida weather. We do not miss the cold, rain , and sleet. I am enjoying my teaching and I have some lovely students.

Enjoy the New Year and I hope 2015 bring you all good things.


Fancy Nancy Says: We are lucky to be alive and well. Thanks to all for being special. Fondly, Nancy

title: Retruned from Tampa
content:
Just returned from a visit to Tampa, but never got to see my grand daughter . That was the purpose of the trip. I was  disappointed that we did not connect . I hope  she and her boyfirend will come to see us next since us going there did not work out.

Fancy Nancy Says: People are too busy today. Young people need to take more time and value friends and famiily more. In life family and friends are very important. Don't ignore them.  You will regret it later.

title: Found Spam
content:
Just found Spam with lots of comments.  I never knew how this worked. Who decides what is spam?

Fansy Nancy is Learning!

title: Getting Appliances Repaired
content:
We are back in Florida and have spent the past two weeks getting appliances repaired:
    The computer, the TV, the car, the vacuum, and I am ready to get time out from all the appliance.s They must miss me when I am away. This is their reventge.

Fancy Nancy Says: Things were simpler before appliances controlled our lives.

title: Back in Naples and Got things Fixed
content:
We just returned and found nothing worked. So far we had the air condtiioner repraired the refrigerator needed help, the disposal, phone, computer and car were all sick. After two days most of them are getting better. They must miss us when we are away.

Fancy Nancy Says: Returning is always an adventure.

title: We relocate this week. Tomorrow the dentist
content:
Just as we are getting ready to relocate, I had a tooth break. I was lucky to call the dentist who returned my call from a conference he was attending. He was so nice. He will see me tomorrow on his day off. I really need rubber teeth that won't break.

Fancy Nancy Says: I am my dentist's pension plan.

title: Finishing Medical Stuff
content:
As we get ready to relocate we are finishing up our medical apts. Also, we are saying goodbyes to family and friends. It is nice to know that we will see them again when we return in May. We arrive in Naples and already we are booked with our Naples friends and activities. I do like living in two places.

Fancy Nancy Says: You can have friends all over.the place.Why not?

title: Problems posting new titles
content:
This week I have searching for ways to write new blogs. There is now a new heading that just came up called new post. Otherwise there was no way for me to post a new item. Computers are great when they work. When they give you problems they are very frustrating.

Fancy Nancy Says: You can lost patience with your computer.

title: Fun in Writing Class
content:
Just wrote a piece for my writing class. We had to write about our best friend. I did a fun  piece all fiction on my imagination. It included my exotic birthday gifts of a Greek cruise on a yacht, a 4 carat emerald and a new house in Nantucket. It is amazing what the imagination can create. Had fun writing it, and even ended with a share in the Brooklyn Bridge,. The tolls should be great !

Fancy Nancy Says: Have fun with your thoughts! No charge.

title: Check       your statements
content:
Yesterday I got a broker statement and was surprised to see something I did not expect. There was a loss and I thought there should have been a profit on a sale. I just wrote to my broker to explain what happened. Time will tell.

Fancy Nancy Says: Read your statements. You never know what you will see.

title: New Instant chord maker
content:
Just learned about a new  instant chord maker for the uke. This would save sore fingers. I might buy one. Two more classes at the library and then we leave for Florida where I also teach starting Nov. I do enjoy my classes and I learn from my students as well.

Fancy Nancy Says: Do what you enjoy and you will be good at it.

title: Two music students arrive
content:
Just two students arrived at my music program. It was fine, but we decided to cancel the other two classes since the class was so small. In any case I tried. Saw the Jane Fonda movie tonight . All about the family getting together for shiva. There were many surprises.
Fancy Nancy Says: So many families have problems.

title: Kitchen Update
content:
Bought a cute small table to store some items. This will add a counter top. My kitchen is so small that counter space is limited. Glad to have this new addition. Tomorrow is my musical happening at the senior center. I have no idea what will happen and if anyone will arrive. Time will tell.

Fancy Nancy Says: What will happen at the happening? I will let you know!

title: Good lunch at the senior center
content:
The local senior center provides an excellent lunch for only $3.00. Today they had chicken marsala with beans and noodles plus pineapple, cottage cheese and all this for a small donation. They do a really good job feeding many folks 60 and up.

Fancy Nancy Says: Senior Centers provide a really good service with lunch and interesting courses.

title: Doing a Music Program
content:
Next week I am running a musical happening at the senior center. I am learning the uke and I asked people to join me for fun music. I have no idea what will happen or who will arrive, but is a happening. One never knows the results.

Fancy Nancy Says: Try something new. Why not!

title: Thursday Writing Class
content:
I teach writing but I also take a class. Today we had the class and it was fun to hear what the other writers shared. Many of my students are now attending this class as well.

Fancy Nancy Says: Classes are fun . You meet many nice people.

title: Wonderful Writing Class
content:
Really enjoyed my class today. They want to continue so the library is allowing the class to meet all through Oct. That works for my schedule and will be a bonus for the group and for me .


Fancy Nancy Says: You never know what a new day will bring.

title: Wonderful family party
content:
Yesterday we celebrated my son's birthday. He seemed to really enjoy his party. We all wrote about him and he got some fun gifts. I was so glad to give him the party. He deserved it. He is a great guy.

Fancy Nancy Says: Appreciate your family. You are lucky to have loved ones.

title: Female Plumber Arrived
content:
Today a woman plumber arrived to fix my sink. She did a good job. The world is changing. Went to a writing class, and then took a ride to Newport on a lovely fall day. Newport was not mobbed like in the summer.

Fancy Nancy Says: Enjoy the fall  weather, it is a lovely time of year.

title: Painting and a Walk
content:
Went to finish my new painting and then took a long walk on a beautiful fall day. Cleaned my closet and got rid of lots of clothes. When I go home and looked at the closet it still is too full. I guess we all have too many things. Tomorrow is writing class. The plumber is due to fix the sink. It leaks.

Fancy Nancy Says: When you have a house there is always something that needs help.

title: New Class Today at a Different Library.
content:
Met today with a new class at the local library. A smaller group, but really nice folks. They are writing life stories. Got my cell phone fixed and then came home and had a nice nap. Started a new painting. It will be like the one I gave my to my daughter, and it will be much larger. I will be doing a musical happening for the senior center. I don't know who will come, but time will tell.


Fancy Nancy Says: It is fun to try out new programs.

title: Painted a Zany Picture
content:
I painted a zany picture and I gave it to me daughter. She said she loved it. I enjoy giving my art to anyone who really likes it. I don't have much talent, but I like to do fun pictures.

Fancy Nancy Says: The good part of art is you can do whatever you feel like.

title: Apple Picking Today
content:
A fun afternoon apple picking . New England is lovely in the fall. Lots of kids picking apples off the trees.   A lovely fall Sunday in Rhode Island.

Fancy Nancy Says: Fall in the north can be lovely.

title: First Class Today was a Success
content:
I ran my first library class today and there were 15 people who attended. I am teaching writing and today it was life story writing. I enjoyed teaching and then came home and enjoyed a nice long nap.

Fancy Nancy loves to teach and take naps.

title: My classes at two libraries are now full
content:
I start to teach at two libraries and both programs are now filled. I do still enjoy my teaching. Today I did some painting and then saw a movie at the library.

Fancy Nancy Says: Libraries offer great programs1

title: Waiting for Home Service
content:
I have booked Home Service several times and each time they were booked,  they did not call to cancel and failed to arrive on time. Perhaps they should be renamed No Service. It seems they need to review their policy since so far it is not working well.

Fancy Nancy Says: They are supposed to compensate me for my waiting time. We will see if it happens.

title: It pays to dispute a bill
content:
Worked on getting a corrected bill from the town. I had a water leak in a pipe and by saving the bill I was able to get my sewer bill corrected as well. It pays to dispute a bill when you think it is wrong. Always do you work in writing , date it and sign it. That is far better than trying to get things done by phone.

Fancy Nancy Says: Writing pays off!

title: Rupert does a New Trick
content:
Enjoyed a visit from my grand dog Rupert who now does a new trick. If you hide a treat for him and close both hands, he will point with his paw at the hand that has the treat. He is usually correct. What a smart dog. Rupert leads a great life with many weekends at the beach. Not a bad dog's life.

Fancy Nancy Says: Most dogs have a great lifestyle. Better than some people.

title: Richard and Betsy's Resort
content:
Just enjoyed an overnight visit to the mountains . What a great job the kids did with their new house. A real treat to see the results of a big project.

Fancy Nancy Says: Enjoy a nice surprise!

title: Wonderful Library Program
content:
Today I presented a program called " Why We Write". I had three authors and a lively audience so it was a hit. I love doing programs that have a responsive audience. It really makes a difference. Due to do two more writing workshops in Sept.

Fancy Nancy Says: Do what you enjoy. It will work and be a hit!

title: Over 11,000 hits on the blog
content:
Wow, just noticed we are over 11,000 on the blog. Great. Love to hear from my readers. Today I was delighted to learn that my Life Story Writing for Sept. is sold out. Great! I am doing another program on Wed. and then another one in Sept. also a writing workshop.

Fancy Nancy Says: I love to do teaching programs.

title: Uke Concert at Senior Center
content:
Played my uke today at a senior center. It is hard to get them really involved. They are more interested in lunch. Also had a nice massage. Need to learn how to handle seeing the music and play at the same time.

Fancy Nancy Says: I am learning about playing my uke for others.

title: Good Uke Lesson and Banking Day
content:
Enjoyed my uke lesson with my wonderful daughter,my uke teacher. She and he husband have done a great job with a free program for the community. They usually have 45 or more folks attend. Also took care of some banking needs and was pleased with the results.

Fancy Nancy Says: Love my uke lessons with my talented daughter.

title: Surgery is over---Hooray!
content:
Yesterday I had dental surgery. It was totally painless. I had an IV and then I never felt a thing. I did not even have to take any pain meds after the surgery. That was amazing to me. I am always glad when surgery is over. I am now missing back teeth on both sides of my mouth, but if I can function without them, then I will not do any replacements. Time will tell.

Fancy Nancy Says: My teeth are my diamonds. I don't have any jewels, all my money is in my mouth.

title: Catching up!
content:
Since I was away last week, today it was time to catch up with things like bills, and E-mail. Then we took  a nice walk by the ocean. It is lovely to live near the ocean. The weather was just great.

Fancy Nancy Says: Even though we do not use the beach , seeing the ocean is delightful.

title: Wonderful Chicago Visit
content:
Wonderful four day trip with my daughter to Chicago. Loved the city and the buildings are gorgeous. I was most impressed with how clean it was and all the beautiful flowers everywhere. We packed in the tours and had a ball.

Fancy Nancy Says: I love my mother /daughter trips!

title: Booked dental surgery
content:
Well the dentists agreed, the tooth has to go. Will have the surgery Aug. 15th. They both said I do not have a choice. One less tooth. A nice lunch with friends and then a nice nap. Working on getting the word out on the library seminars that I will be doing. I am doing three programs at three different libraries.

Fancy Nancy Says: Libraries offer wonderful programs, free!

title: New numbers--10920 have seen this blog. Keep reading!
content:
A nice day in Conn. trying to find a Rebox show outlet. Finally found it and then had a lovely dinner in Mystic. Tomorrow is dentist day again. Will learn more if I have to lose a tooth. My authors program will run in Aug. so now I am doing the publicity for it. 

Fancy Nancy Says: I just got booked to play the uke--My new hobby.

title: Dental Problems Can Keep Me Busy
content:
Today I consulted with a dental surgeon. At some point I will have to have one or two teeeth pulled. Right now they have me on an antibiotic. Since the tooth is under a bridge, two dentists will be involved. My teeth are my real diamonds. All my money goes into them. 

Fancy Nancy Says: My kids are grown up, but my teeth seem to keep me busy. Take care of your teeth.

title: Working on Teeth, Seminars, and Writing Programs
content:
This week I am trying to deal with a tooth problem so the dentist just put me on an antibiotic. Hope it works. Also, I am enjoying several programs I am taking and in Aug. and Sept. I will be presenting programs for three different libraries. I find that the libraries offer some wonderful programs for the public and the are all free. 

Fancy Nancy Says: Take advantage of your library free programs.

title: Learning to Play the Uke
content:
Had another lesson today and my daughter is an excellent teacher with lots of patience. I am enjoying learning to play the uke. Lots of fun songs once you know the basic chords. 

Fancy Nancy Says: Try something new.

title: A Uke Presentation
content:
Today I played for my first uke audience. I take a writing class and we were to tell what we did this summer. I bought a ukulele and my daughter has been giving me lessons. I was very brave and played one song for my writing class and they sang with me and applauded at the end. It was fun and I am enjoying a new toy.

Fancy Nancy Says: Try something new. Why not!

title: Hearing Workshop
content:
Did a hearing workshop at the library today. 14 attended. I thought it went well. We always want a larger crowd, but it was a rainy day. I enjoy doing library programs. I am booked with three different libraries this summer and some in Florida in the spring.

Fancy Nancy Says: I still love to do programs and teach. Why not!

title: Wonderful Family Outing with the Krims
content:
A fun family party with my sister and her whole family. It was nice to see everyone together sharing Steph's college graduation. It seems the next generation is really on their way. They are all grown up.

Fancy Nancy Says: We are lucky to have a great family.

title: Fun Interview with a Former Student
content:
I had a library interview today and I was delighted to renew time with a former student now the librarian. When you teach for a while you meet some lovely students. It is often hard to remember all their names. They somehow remember you. 
Fancy Nancy Says: That is the fun part of teaching. You meet such nice students.

title: Writing Class, Exercise and Even the Dentist
content:
Today was a full day, but fun. Went to my writing class and then my exercise class. Met a lovely woman and we chatted as we exercised. I was amazed to learn that she will be located this winter in Florida not far from us.. I am sure we will connect there . Her husband plays tennis with my partner as well. 

Fancy Nancy Says: It really is a small world

title: Fun Uke Class
content:
Tonight we attended a fun uke class. It was interesting to hear some of the students perform. This was just the second class, but the performers were not beginners. I can now perform two songs. I find the fingering tough, but I am doing better. 

Fancy Nancy Says: It is good for your brain to try to learn something brand new. A challenge!

title: My Second Uke Lesson
content:
My daughter is such a patient teacher. I now know how my students feel when they are new at a project. I will go on Wed. to their uke workshop to be held at the local library. They are really promoting the program and probably 50 will arive. My daughter is a wonderful support system for he husband. He is lucky to have her in his life. 

Fancy Nancy Says: Everyone needs a daughter!

title: Learning the Uke
content:
My daughter gave me my first uke lesson. Strumming is okay, but doing the chords can be a problem. My fingers don't want to go where they are supposed to go. Tonight I watched some free videos on playing the uke. The only song I could play is Frere Jacques since all I have to do is sturm the C chord. 

Fancy Nancy Says: It takes work and concentration to learn a new insturment.

title: Booked a Family Party
content:
Just booked a family party for our Early Thanksgiving. Since we are all at different places in Nov. we celebrate the holiday much earlier. Why not. The important part is for everyone to get together. I look forward to family parties. 

Fancy Nancy Says: Change the holiday dates if you have to.

title: Exercise
content:
Went to swim on Saturday and exercise on machines on Sunday. Try to use the Y since it can get too hot outside. Had a nice visit from Rupert , my grand dog. He now knows where I live and I love his visits. 

Fancy Nancy Says: Grand dogs can be lots of fun. Like grandchildren  they visit and the parents have the rest of the work. Fun!

title: Writing Class and Dentist Day
content:
Joined my writing class briefly before my dental apt. I do enjoy the class since it gets me writing. We had to write dialogue, so I wrote about a discussion with myself as a Gemini. We Gemini's are twins, so there are two in one.

Fancy Nancy Says: Gemini's can do lots of things and then they need a nap. Dentists today can do miracles.

title: My Uke Needs Help
content:
Tried to tune my new uke and one string would never tighten. Guess I will go back to the music store to see if they know what caused the problem. Trying a new skill does take patience. 

Fancy Nancy Says: Start all over  if you have to. You can't learn in a day. You need to understand the instrument.

title: New Uke Bought Today
content:
My daughter helped me buy a ukulele and I think I will enjoy learning how to play. I always loved the piano, but with hearing issues, music changed. It should be fun to learn a new instrument. 

Fancy Nancy Says: Never stop learning.

title: Learning About Ukes
content:
Went to a uke workshop and tried to see if I would want to buy one. Then went online and there are some good free videos to teach you. Also saw a video about how to buy a uke. Time will tell, but I always like to learn. So glad to see lots of new friends online for my blog. How did you find it? 

Fancy Nancy Says: Love to hear from new friends online. Send me a message.

title: Wonderful Uke Program
content:
Attended a wonderful uke program where my son-in-law attracted a large group to teach the ukelele . I did not do the finer pointes, but strummed along anyway. He enjoys this project and he attracts a nice crowd. Anyone can attend and it is free. The library gave them the room to use for workshops. People of all ages attended. 

Fancy Nancy Says: It is nice to see groups get together just for fun.

title: Rainy Medical Day
content:
Today it rained all day.Had medical apts. and tried to set up delivery for a new refrigerator. This past week was a medical week. We sure keep the doctors in business. As we get older it takes more time to patch the body. 

Fancy Nancy Says: Take care of your body, it is the only one you will get.

title: Medical Day and Rupert Visit
content:
Did two medical apts. today and then tonight had a surprise visit from my son and his granddog Rupert. The dog is due for his monthly harido and it costs a lot more than my haircuts. My son seems to enjoy having the dog visit. It is like he has a grandchild now. 

Fancy Nancy Says: All grandchildren are fun even dogs. Rupert likes to visit.

title: Birthday Lunch
content:
A fun birthday lunch with my niece Jane. She told me all about her new projects. Drove golf balls and it was very windy. Then home for a nice nap. Tomorrow another medical day. 

Fancy Nancy Says: It is fun to reconnect with family up north.

title: Lahey Visit
content:
Just returned from a good visit to Lahey Clinic. All is well and they are excellent. It pays to go to the best. 

Fancy Nancy Says: Go to the best place where you like the medical staff. Why not!

title: Wonderful Family Weekend
content:
We were lucky to see all our family this weekend. We wish it could happen more often. They look great and the grandkids are adults at this point. What a joy it was to connect. We look forward to another get together in Sept. Not too far away. We have a very nice family. 

Fancy Nancy Says: Family is very important!

title: Medical Day
content:
I do keep the medical community in business. Today I saw my internist and then 2 hours at the dentist. They do not need a pension plan with me as a client. 

Fancy Nancy Says: As you get older each week often has a medical apt. At least we can try to patch up our bodies.

title: Nice Visit With College Friends
content:
Today we had lunch with two wonderful college friends. There were 6 of us since we each brought a partner. We talked about our next big reunion which is in two years--- 60 years out of college. Hard to believe where the time went. I am the only one still taking fun job interviews. 

Fancy Nancy Says: I love taking job interviews. Fun!

title: Wonderful Birthday
content:
Loved a fun day on my birthday. Enjoyed lunch with my daughter and then went to a fun evening at an artist's home . It was like a European salon where people performed and shared cultural things. A cellist performed, an artist shared pictures and a unique time. I have fun.

Fancy Nancy Says: Enjoy every day not just your birthday.

title: Nice Early Birthday Day
content:
Today I handled several things. I made an arrangement to barter my refiregerator for some massages. I had ordered a new one. Then my massage therapist showed me the house I had to find to tomorrow afternoon. It was tucked into a road that had a rope cutting off entry. Next we had a nice theatre afternoon and saw a musical. Tomorrow is my actual birhtday and I got lots of nice E-mails. Many thanks in advance to all. It is always fun to connect. 

Fancy Nancy Says: Getting older can include getting better.

title: New Visitors to My Blog . Welcome to All
content:
I just saw that I had three new visitors and it is always fun to learn how they found the site. If anyone wants to share that information, I would love to learn. Send me an answer if you read this. Thanks from Fancy Nancy

Fancy Nancy Says : It is fun to learn how my readers found my blog. Keep me posted. Thanks in advance.

title: Boy , It is Cold!
content:
New England is known for changes in the weather. Yesterday it was gorgeous, about 90 and today it feels like winter, about 35 rainly and cold. That is New England for you. Caught up with some paperwork, then played bridge this afternoon. Tomorrow I have class again and then the ear doctor. I am working on my summer schedule. Each time we relocate there are transitiions before we settle in. 

Fancy Nancy Says: Relocating is fun, but it takes some adjustments.

title: Interesting Day Today
content:
Met with an author who will speak at the program I am presenting in Aug. I enjoy meeting new folks and today I also started at new class at the Y. It is called Live Strong. Nice ti connect with new people.

Fancy Nancy Says: Joining new groups lead to new options.

title: Familiy Time
content:
We returned to Rhode Island and learned of family illness. Today we went to a funeral as a result. Don , Marty's brother-in-law died. He has been sick for 9 years and finally the cancer won. A sad day for all. 

Fancy Nancy Says: Death can be painful for the patient and the family.

title: Looks Like A New Format for Posts
content:
When I hit the word link it allows me to type. Otherwise I am unable to type. Computers are strange. 

Fancy Nancy is not a computer whiz.

title: Untitled Post
content:
Now I can type again. I do not know what happened. In any case we returned up north and took care of lots of medical appointments. Working on getting a summet schedule for teaching. I do not know what I hit to allow me to type again. Computers can confuse for sure. 

Learned from research that the red shoes from the Wizard of Oz were really silver shoes not red in the actual book. What a discovery! 

Fancy Nancy Says: Research pays off.

title: Have to Try Another Site Can't Type on This One
Getting Closer to Leaving
content:
We    are connecting with good friends before we leave. This week we will be wrapping up things and the car leaves on Sat. Relocating reminds me of the end of summer camp. Everyone has mixed emotions.

Fancy Nancy Says: All the seniors are in Winter Camp. Now it is time to go home.

title: A Wonderful Teaching Day
content:
I had three students this morning and one this afternoon. A very productive teaching day. I always enjoy my students and I hope they have the same feeling about the classes. I am happy a nice young man get a job as well. Hope he at least gets an interview.

Fancy Nancy Says: We all need people to help us along the way.

title: Working on Getting Ready to Relocate
content:
When you relocate you have to check that your banks know your new address. They often will not forward your statements otherwise. Today I was working on checking my accounts and I noticed that one new account was not accurate.

Fancy Nancy Says; You really have to follow up what the bank is posting. Don't assume it is accurate.

title: Fun Class With My Student Today.
content:
I have a lovely student who I am working with weekly. She has a lot ot skills and I know she will find what she is looking for. Right now she is in a search. I wrote an article and was amazed to learn that the ruby red shoes in the movie THE WIZARD OF OZ  were actually silver shoes in the book.


Fancy Nancy Says: What a surprise to learn that the ruby red slippers were actually silver not red.

title: Social Time in Florida
content:
Many folks are getting ready to relocate up north. It reminds me of the end of season at summer camp. The grandparents have been in winter camp. Now they are getting ready to go north. We are lucky to avoid the cold northrn winters. We do not miss the snow.

Fancy Nancy Says: Snow is for the Eskimos and Sarah Palin

title: Zipper Club Meeting
content:
A full day. Medical apt. with new skin Dr. Teaching, and then the zipper club and in between the rug cleaner. Got it all in a very full day. Love my student . She is searching for her new life. More like therapy than teaching writing. In either case, she has many talents and will soon find her new life.

Fancy Nancy Says: Teaching is fun with nice students. Hope the new skin cream heals a problem.

title: Medical Day Again
content:
Trying to get rid of a problem so it was back to the skin doctor. She will try something new and see if it works. Healing the body is sometimes a trick. I got the lab results and I think that may help. Always some part that needs help at this age. Which part do you fix first? Lucky I got in to see the skin doctor when I went to the office. She saw me and I did not have an apt. I was lucky.

Fancy Nancy Says: Going to the doctors office works better than phone calls.

title: Wonderful Mother/Daughter Time
content:
I always enjoy my time with my wonderful daughter. It was so nice to have an overnight with her and enjoy a comfortable hotel nearby. We do it twice a year and would love it more times as well. It seems that families get very busy and we have to make time for each other.

Fancy Nancy Says: Make time for your family. Nothing is more important!

title: Getting Things Updated
content:
We relocate in a month so I have started to get things updated. All my addresses have to be changed for accounts. Many of the banks will not forward statements or mail. Just hired a new driver for the car. We have several end of the year parties before folks relocate.


Fancy Nancy Says: Time to get ready to go north. Hope the weather gets warmer there.

title: Nice Overnight Trip
content:
We took a short overnight trip just an hour away. In sptie of the fact that we were not gone even 24 hours, when we got home it felt much longer. It does pay to take even a short get-away. The change is uplifting.

Fancy Nancy Says: We all need a break!

title: New Driver Hired Tonight
content:
My last blog stated if you need somthing ask for it. I needed a driver to take my car north. I did ask and just hired a lovely person from where I work. I asked and it worked.

Fancy Nancy Says: Network!

title: One Day At A Time
content:
Just heard a good book on tape with the title, One Day At A Time. It seems like a good plan for everyone. Yesterday, the person who was due to drive my car up north got sick. Today I started to network and I think I have two people interested in the job. Networking pays!

Fnacy Nancy Says: If you need something ask for it!

title: No Guests Arrive
content:
Last night I had prepared a lovely dinner, but no guests arrived. They may have told my partner, but he never told me that they were not coming. Well as  a result, we saw a movie and we now have a full refrigerator. The best part is I do not have to cook for a while. We have a lot of food left over.

Fancy Nancy Says: When your invited guests do not arrive, time to go to the movies.  PS How do you delete comments from the blog?

title: Meeting of the Zipper Club
content:
Tonight we went to a meeting of the zipper club. Most of the folks there had recovered from heart surgery. Today they glue you together, no more stitches. A lot easier on the patient.

Fancy Nancy Says: I was glued together last summer after an accident. It beats having stitiches.

title: Bank Proposals
content:
Went to the private bank to present proposals for writing client life stories. I don't know if they will be interested, but I have nothing to lose by asking.

Fancy Nancy Says: You need to ask for what you want.

title: Nice Getaway
content:
This weekend we had a nice overnight trip and Marty did well. We did not go very far, but it still was a good change. I find for me even an overnight change helps me feel better.

Fancy Nancy Says: Take a break ,you may need it too!

title: Library Proposals
content:
Today I talked to the local library to see if I could present some programs for next season. They said they are booking programs now so I might have a chance. I do love to teach and this teaching season classes have been very small. Time will tell.

Fancy Nancy Says: If you want to find new jobs, you have to market yourself.

title: Saw the movie Nebraska
content:
Tonight we saw the movie Nebraska. I thought the acting was excellent. The subject is a bit depressing, but maybe because we are getting older it hits home. Overall a lovely Florida day.

Fancy Nancy Says: Aging is not always easy.

title: Thinggs Are Getting Better
content:
Things are improving. Marty is stronger and I can  relax a bit now. Thank goodness surgrey is behind us .


Fancy Nancy Says: It is nice to see a patient get well.

title: Things Are Improving
content:
Marty is healing and things are getting better. He is getting back some of his energy. It is amazing what they can do medically today. Many lives are saved with new medical techniques.

Fancy Nancy Says: You have to be lucky with your health. Cherish it!

title: A Quiet Class, no students
content:
Students have not arrived this week. Need to do some marketing. Have been too busy with helping Marty recover. A relaxing day and evening.

Fancy Nancy Says: Sometimes it is good when things slow down.

title: Company Today
content:
Marty's son arrived to check on his recuperation. Marty is doing well and making good progress.

Fancy Nancy Says: Mother Nature takes her time to heal.

title: Where Did the Month Go?
content:
We are now at the end of February. This month flew by. I have been busy with Marty's recuperation and trying to correct a banking problem. I hope to fit in some fun things before it is time to relocate.


Fancy Nancy Says: Make some time for fun things in your day.

title: An Overnight Getawau
content:
We were able to get away just for an overnight. I really needed it. Marty came home exhausted and slept most of the day. It is going to take him more time than he realized for his body to heal. The time away did me good.

Fancy Nancy Says: Everyone needs a break!

title: Lovely Florida weather
content:
Today I went to teach. There were no students, so I used the time to write a brochure for all the programs that I teach. Marty is still very tired, but he is driving now. That is a real help.

Fancy Nancy Says: If you  do what you enjoy it is not work. I do not enjoy driving, it is work.

title: An Exhausting Time
content:
For the past several weeks my partner has been in the hospital with heart surgery. He came home and then had to return to the hospital. Right now, I think things are getting better. It has been a very rough time for both of us.

Fancy Nancy Says: Appreicate your good health.

title: Surgery is Done Now it is Time to Heal
content:
Marty had heart bi-pass surgery yesterday. A tough one. Today was also tax day and I will have to close an account to avoid check theft. Does three problems make a record to one day? I need a break. The interesting part was that a Croatian priest who speaks no English wants to take my class. Should be interesting.

Fancy Nancy Says: Life can be complicated.

title: Facing Major Sugery is No Picnic
content:
My partner will be have bi-pass heart surgery on Thrusday. This 12 days he has been in the hospital and now the tests all say he needs a heart bi-pass. It is a very scary time. I am overwhelmed by what is going on. I hope all will go well . Medical issues can really be tough.

Fancy Nancy Says: Time  Out!

title: Teaching Today A Break from Medical Issues
content:
I find that my teaching is so good. I enjoy the work and it helps me to relax. We have some very serious medical issues to deal with. Surgery on Monday for my partner , he has no choice. 

Fancy Nancy Says: Life can be tough at times.

title: Tough Times Right Now
content:
My partner is in the hospital and due for heart. Medical issues can be tough. His kids will come in and one just left for Ca. He is handling it, but it is not fun for either of us. I guess we just have to hang in there. 

Fancy Nancy Says: I am hanging by a thread.

title: Computer and Medical Problems
content:
My computer is having aol problems. The company is lousy. I am too busy with medical issues. to wait online to get help. They don't have phone help on Sundays. Life can be complicated . Medical issues can also be a problem. I am dealing with both. Not fun! 

Fancy Nancy Says: This too will pass. I hope!

title: Dentist Today
content:
I am my dentist's pension plan. I had my teeth cleaned and naturally there is more work to be done. Saving my teeth is a full time job. I have my teeth cleaned every 6 weeks and yet I still have cavities when I go for a checkup. You have to be lucky with your health.

Fancy Nancy Says: As you get older the body requires a lot of repair work.

title: Feeling better
content:
Fianlly after taking 3 different medications, I have stopped coughing. Bronchitis can be tough coupled with asthma. It has gotten warmer thank goodness. We saw Mandella the movie. Well done.

Fancy Nancy Says: No fun being sick.

title: More Medical Apts
content:
Today I saw a Naples doctor. He said not more antibiotics. I am starting to feel better. Naples medicince does not compare to Lahey Clinic.

Fancy Nancy Says: Staying well is a trick.

title: Teaching was fun today.
content:
I had two nice men on class and both of them were jouranlists. Enjoyed connecting with family for dinner.

Fancy Nancy really enjoys teaching.

title: Still Working on Shaking a Cold
content:
On Thurs. I return to the doctor to see if I need a third med to shake my cough. I still have it. Closed a bank account today since the bank insisted on charging $30 per month and I don't even use the account. I felt the manager at the bank did a poor job of handling the problems.

]Fancy Nancy Says: There are lots of stupid people in the world. Too bad you can't fix stupid.

title: Dealing with health issues is not always easy.
content:
I am still having bronchitis in spite of two different antibiotics. On Thurs. I will see the doctor to ask him to test to find what strain of bateria I have. I am better, but I still am coughing . Also, I am trying to help my partner who has medical issues. He is doing better, but I am running into family complications. LIfe can be tough at times.

Fancy Nancy Says; Some things are tougher than others to handle. Health issues are up there as tough problems.

title: A Six Hour Wait at the Walk In Clinic
content:
Today I decided I needed a chest xray. I have had a cold for a week and in spite of an antibiotic, I was still coughing and feeling lousy. I entered the clinic at noon and they said why are you here? I answered I think I have bronchitis. After six hours , a chest xray, the diagnosis was bronchitis.

Fancy Nancy Says: In my next life should I be a doctor???? No way! They gave me very costly medicine that tastes vile for $175. My insruance did not cover the medicine. They should pay me for taking the stuff. Happy 2014.

title: Lahey Clinic is Just Great
content:
Just returned from wonderful Lahey Clinic. They helped with our medical issues. The doctor there gave us each about 2 hours of his time. Most doctors don't even give you 15 min. After many tests, they gave my partner a medicine that so far is working. It pays to find the best doctor and the best medical advice. We just returned from cold Boston, but it was worth the trip.

Fancy Nancy Says: Travel if you have to and get the best medical advice. It will pay off.

title: A Confusing Week
content:
My partner is having medical issues. We have been doing tests all week  and we hope to get the dianosis. Medical issues are not easy. We are lucky to have some good doctors involved.

Fancy Nancy Says: Medical issues are not fun , but sometimes you have no choice. Happy Holidays.

title: Workiong With Banks Today is A Challenge
Medical Week
content:
I am happy to say that the shot I got to help my arm is working. I waited many months before trying it, but it does seem to work. I did get a reaction last night, but today I am much better. Time will tell. 

Fancy Nancy Says: Sometimes you have to take risks and hope they work.

title: Nice Students
content:
Enjoyed  my class and was glad to have some nice students. Took a shot to help the pain in my arm and hope it works. It did cause a reaction, but sometimes you cure one thing and the cure causes a different problem. Well, that is the risk we take in life. Sometimes there is a tradeoff. Nothing is one way. 

Fancy Nancy Says: You have to decide what risks you are willing to take. Listen to your body.  As we age it takes more listening.

title: Fun time with Family
content:
Had a fun reunion with my daughter, her husband and my wonderful grandson and his girlfriend. It is so nice to have time to connect with family. I am tying to get used to my new computer. Hope everyone has had a nice holidays. 

Fancy Nancy Says: Enjoy family visits.

title: New Computer is A Learning Situation
content:
Well, I had Microsoft word installed and now I need to find out if my computer will print word. One day at a time. Hope you all had a nice holidays. Did you eat too much? I had peanut butter and jelly for super since we have turkey in the house all the time. A new menu for the holiday. We look forward to connecting with family this weekend. 

Fancy Nancy Says: Every day is a new adventure.

title: Happy Thanksgiving to Everyone
content:
Well, I did it. I had to buy microsoft word. What a monopoly. We had a quiet Thanksgiving , I did some shopping for a party I will give, then I took a nice nap and ate a peanut butter and jelly sandwich. Now that is a different holidays menu. Last night we had turkey at a restaurant, so I still had some for lunch as well. Glad to have a computer again.

Famcy Nancy Says: Enjoy the holidays and don't get too tired. Take lots of naps. They really help.

title: New Computer
content:
Well, I now have my new computer, but I just learned that in order to download my files, I have to install another program. This computer does not come with Microsoft Word. I called and they told me the price. What a system. I can't type a letter or read my files unless I buy the product. They really have you! 

Fancy Nancy Says: Let's go back to pencil and paper.

title: A New Computer
content:
Well, I finally got a new computer . I still do not know how to use it . I am shocked that I actually got my blog again. I have missed blogging. The new computers are very different and I really do not understand the features. 

Fancy Nancy Says: Every day has new challenges.

title: Letter Writintg
content:
Today I had some issues that needed adjustment. I find that writing for me is the key to solving some problems. That way, my blood pressure does not get upset. By writing clearly what is on your mind, you can solve lots of issues for yourself and for others.


Fancy Nancy Says: There is power in the pen and in the computer. Writing makes good sense.

title: Fun Lunch with Friends
content:
Lovely lunch with friends then a nice surprise my grandson came over and I gave him a birthday gift. He is just a wonderful young man. He is kind and caring and I am so proud of him. I am lucky to have a nice family.

Fancy Nancy Says: Be lucky with your family if possible. I have been lucky.

title: A Full Medical Day
content:
Today we spent the day in Boston for a medical visit. We saw the back doctor and he set up shots to help Marty's back. We hope it works. It was a full day, but if it works and rids him of pain, it will be worth it.

Fancy Nancy Says: You have to find the right doctors. That takes some doing!

title: Lahey Clinic is Fabulous
content:
Today I went to Lahey Cliinic  in Burlington for several medical appointments. They are just wonderful . The doctors and staff really do a great job. It is so nice to find a medical facility that has been so helpful.They take their time and get it right.

Fancy Nancy Says: I applaud Lahey Clinic. They are just great.

title: Send Me Ideas For Aging Gracefully
content:
I am teaching and taking courses at the Senior Center. This morning I started Spanish again. I have taken it before, but since I do not use it very often, I forgot most of it. The teacher is a student of mine. as well. It is fun to take courses again. I am also taking a history course as well.

Fancy Nancy Says: Senior Centers serve a useful purpose.

title: SEND YOUR IDEAS
content:
One of my students wants me to discuss aging gracefully. If you have any thoughts on the subject do let me know. I value your opinion. Taking care of  your health is one very important part of again. As we get older the parts of the body require more time and repair.

Fancy Nancy Says: Pamper your body. I love massage!

title: Teaching Again and Loving It
content:
My class at the senior center started on Monday. We had 7 who came to Speaking and Listening. We talked about interesting words starting with the letter A. At our next meeting we will have a show and tell using the words we select with the letter A. Fun class.

Fancy Nancy Says: Teaching can be lots of fun.

title: Great Family Party and Wonderful New England Weather
content:
On Sunday we had loads of fun when my family connected in Conn. at a lovely restaurant. It was wonderful to have everyone get together. We celebrated my son Steven's birthday and enjoyed seeing one another. Wish we could do it more often. Hard to connect all the different schedules.

Fancy Nancy Says: Love to share happy times with my wonderful family.

title: Wonderful Lunch with My Daughter
content:
It is really great to have my daughter nearby . She leaves soon for Florida and I will miss our lunches. Working on medical stuff and I am taking an interesting wellness course at the Senior Center. They offer some excellent programs . I also teach for them.

Fancy Nancy Says: Seniors make excellent students. I love giving classes for them.

title: Senior Center Has Excellent Classes
content:
Today, I went to the history class at the Senior Center. Then I attended the exercise class as well. The Senior Center has some good courses and most of the teachers volunteer their time. I will be doing a course in Oct. It is called speaking and listening. The weather is beautiful right now. New England is lovely in the fall. . Glad to be back in Rhode Island after a tough trip to Ca.

Fancy Nancy Says: You really appreciate your home after a tough trip.

title: Dental Day
content:
This morning I had my teeth cleaned and then in the afternoon I visited a different dentist to glue in a bridge. I was amazed that for the first time in my life I did not have a long list of cavities. Boy was I happy.

Fancy Nancy Says: If you live long enough amazing things do happen.!

title: Goodbye Ca.
content:
I have to use a different site to print on my computer . Otherwise, my computer will not let me type on my blog. I am recuperating from my Ca. trip. I am still black and blue from an accident and I do ache. I was lucky that it is my right side, since I have an implant on my left side and that would have been a big problem. I guess you have to be lucky even in an accident.

Fancy Nancy Says: Life is a roller coaster and sometimes it is very rocky.Time does help to heal the body and the mind. I am not rushing back to Ca.

title: Medical Vacation
content:
My trip to Ca. was not the best. Day 2 I chipped a tooth, Day 4 I got a bad cold  Day 6 I had an accident and was taken to the hospital.

Fancy Nancy Says: I was lucky to get home safely and thank the medical folks for pasting me back together. I am bruised, but luckily nothing was broken. You have to be thankful . It could have been much worse.

title: Getting Ready to Travel
content:
We are leaving to visit family in California. A long flight, but worth it. We hope to celebrate the New Year with family in Ca.

Fancy Nancy Says: It is nice to share holidays with your family.

title: Retirement Program Today
content:
I enjoyed doing a retirement program at the local library. I had 5 speakers and they were all good. We had only a small audience. I think everyone enjoyed the program and I enjoyed doing it. I got the speakers and it was up to the library to do the publicity.

Fancy Nancy Says: It is fun to do new programs for different groups.

title: New Way to Type
content:
Gold Chrome is the only way I can type on my blog. I never know hwy, but things have changed. Had a great trip to Ottowa with my wonderful daughter. What a beautiful city and the Parliament and museums are just great. On Friday a girl riding a motorbike she could not handle ran right into my car when I was at a stopsign. My car needs to be fixed, but I am fine.

Fancy Nancy Says: You never know what is around the corner.

title: Must Now Type on Gold Chrome
Typing on New Site
content:
Just had a great trip with my wonderful daughter. We enjoyed at visit to OTTOWA, CANADA.  What a lovely place to visit. Great museums and the Parliament Building is gorgeous. Lucky to be able to have 5 wonderful days.

Fancy Nancy Says: Travel when you can. you always learn something new.

title: Typing again on a new site. Could not type on aol
content:
Great , I can type on Gold Chrome. For some reason I could not longer type on aol. It does not make sense to me, but I am glad they found a way for me to type. Classes are nearly over and hoping to take a nice trip with my daughter. Started some physical therapy, but the therapist it too rough. Need to make some changes, perhaps a new therapist will work better for me.

Fancy Nancy Says: If  you are not happy with your treatment plan, speak to the person in charge and make some changes. You are your best advocate.

title: Computer Won't Type Again for my Blog. Phooey on Aol
New European Blog Readers
content:
Welcome to my new readers. Hope you enjoy my blog. Feel free to write a comment. Today the sun came out and the weather was lovely. The summer is going quickly. This week I will have dinner guests plus teaching and a few medical apptointments. It seems that as we get older the body parts need more attention. I asked the doctor to make me 25 again and he said if he could do that he would get the Nobel prize. We are all grateful to still be here. Life is a gift. 

Fancy Nancy Says: Enjoy each day, even if the body needs more attention. Be happy we are still here!

title: Enjoyed Teaching Speed Reading Today
content:
Had a nice group for my class today. I do enjoy teaching and you meet many  nice new people. I have only one more session for that class. I find it fun to teach. 

Fancy NancySays: Pick what you enjoy doing and it won't be any work at all. I love to teach, so my work is my fun.

title: Booked Our Trip to Visit Family
content:
Today I booked our trip to visit family on the west coast. We look forward to family time and it is important. Had a fun lunch with my wonderful daughter, and it is always a delight to share time with her. The weather is getting cooler. 

Fancy Nancy Says: Each new day is a new adventure. Enjoy what you do!

title: Exercise Day
content:
Today I went to the Y and did the treadmill and then went to a pool and swam. A good exercise day since it was not so hot. Had a nice nap and tonight took a ride to lovely Jametstown. Quite a scene with the boats and the bridge. 

Fancy Nancy Says: Enjoy the beauty of the place you are in. Rhode Island is surrounded by the water. That makes parts of the state so beautiful.

title: Low Key Day
content:
After a very busy week, today I did a low key day. In the morning I was not feeling great, so I took it easy and by the evening we went to see an action packed film with Bruce Willis. I am not keen on viioilence in the movies, and this movie, Red 2 was very violent. We are still in a heat wave. 


Fancy Nancy says: When you are in a heat wave, drink a lot and don't knock yourself out. It is not worth it.

title: Interesting Day
content:
After a medical apt. I went to the Salvation Army store . You can often find some great things at these thrift shops. Like eveyone , I love a bargain. Tonight we spent a lovely evening with some friends for dinner. It is still very hot in Rhode Island. 

Fancy Nancy Says: When it is too hot, forget exercising. It does not make good sense.

title: Working on Booking Flights
content:
It seems that every time you call an airline the prices change with each new call. We are hoping to book a flight soon and on working on getting the best deal. It is still very hot. Hope it cools off soon. 

Fancy Nancy Says: Getting the best deal takes some work. Patience is a must.

title: Happy To Type Again
content:
So far I can now type again. It is very hot here in Rhode Island. It has been in the 90's all week. I spoke with Florida and I think our heat is beating them. Today I played bridge. There were 16 folks playing at the senior center. After the games many of them are all talking at once. I am lucky that I can turn off my hearing, since I wear a cochelar implant. When it gets too noisy, I can create silence. 


Fancy Nancy Says: There are times when being deaf with a cochlear implant is most pleasant. I can hear when I want , and I can stop hearing when I want. I have choices.

title: What A Pleasure
content:
Fancy Nancy is thrilled to be able to type again on my conputer. It was a job getting aol to fix it. I would leave them, but I do not want to change everything on my address book. Oh well, I can now type again. It is very hot in Rhode Island. All week it has been over 90 degrees. We are not used to such heat waves. It is hotter than Florida. 


Fancy Nancy Says: Stay cool even in the heat.

title: Great! I Can Type Again!
content:
Wow! Finally , they corrected my computer so I can type. I have aol with constant problems. At least today they seem to have fixed one.

Fancy Nancy Says: If you live long enough some problems get resolved. Time helps!

title: Hope My Blog Works
content:
My goodness, I can type again. Miracles do happen. I have been working on this for over a week. Hope it works.


Fancy Nancy Says: Glad to be back.

title: My Computer Still Will Not Allow me to type! Help!
Can I type Now? No Only titles.
Can I Type Now? My Computer Says No!
My computer will not let me type
Enjoyed Family Party
content:
We had a fun family party. Saw a movie about Washington DC . It was a bit overdone. Was saddened to learn a friend of mine from work lost his daughter due to cancer. What a tragedy!

Fancy Nancy Says: Life is not always fair!

title: Fun Famlly NIght
content:
It is always fun to have the family together. We even had entertainment with my daughter and her husband. They play the ukelele. and we all sang along with them. The food was great and I even forgot to serve one dish that stayed in the oven. I wondered what I kept smelling, and we finally discovered. the eggplant was still cooking and starting to smell and burn. 

Fancy Nancy Says: Cooks do sometimes forget all the stuff in the oven.

title: July 4th
content:
Today was a lovely sunny day in Rhode Island. Throngs were at the beach. Did lots of cooking for a family get together tomorrow. I am looking forward to being with all my kids. What a nice treat for me. 


Fancy Nancy Says: We are lucky when we can connect with our children.

title: Fun Day with Massage, Bridge and Dinner with Friends
content:
A fun day today. Enjoyed a wonderful massage, social bridge and then dinner with friends. Getting ready for a fun family visit. Did most of the cooking and shopping yesterday and today. I love wihen everyone can connect in the family. It does not happen that often, so it is special! 

Fancy Nancy Says: We love when we can connect with the family. I am lucky to have great kids and grandkids.

title: Fun Lunch
content:
I met my wonderful daughter for lunch today. We always have a lot to share. Both of us took day trips to Conn. over the rainy weekend. We enjoyed seeing Old Saybrook. It was lovely to have lunch by the Conn river. I would like to explore other towns in Conn. in the future. 

Fancy Nancy likes new places to visit.

title: Wonderful Andrew
content:
Today my wonderful grandson came to resuce me with my computer problems. After I had paid a technician to fix my computer, he had added a program that completly slowed it down so it did not work. Today Andrew removed that program and a miracle happened. The computer seems to work again. Thanks !
Andrew you are just great!!! I am lucky to have some wonderful kids and grandchldren. Lucky me!

Fancy Nancy Says: When you have a problem you have to hang in there and find the right person to help you out. This sometimes takes some time. Patience is a virtue!

title: Untitled Post
content:
I am  still having computer problems so I am using a library computer to now. Technology can be a pain.

Fancy Nancy Says: This too will pass.

title: Computers Can Be A Pain
content:
I have spent this past week trying to fix my computer and I may have to buy a new one. It seems that my computer does not have enough memory and with aol things will not work. Today I felt like throwing the computer out the window. I do need a computer to help me since my hearing does not exist. Oh well , this too will pass. 

Fancy Nancy Says: Paitence is a virtue . I could use some right now.

title: Enjoyable Time with Family
content:
Last night we had a fun dinner with my daughter and her husband. Tonight we enjoyed a visit with my son. The nice part of being up north is that we get to see family . I am planning a family reunion for Sept and I am trying to get everyone to find a date that works. It is always a trick to try to find a date and time that everyone is free to attend. 

Fancy Nancy Says: Family times are lots of fun.

title: Lots of New Visitors to my Blog
content:
It is always fun to view where my readers are located. Love to hear from them. I noticed I have had some new visitors on my blog, and they are from many different locations in the US and overseas. This makes writing a blog lots of fun. 

Fancy Nancy Says: Welcome! Glad to have new readers . Let me hear from you.

title: My LIbrary Program is Getting Panelists
content:
I am working on a panel of speakers for a library program on Retirement. I am meeting new people and right now I have 5 who said they will speak. I only hope the library gets me an audience. Time will tell. 


Fancy Nancy Says: It is fun to meet new people.

title: Technology Can Be A Pain
content:
Last week my computer did not work, my new phone would not work. Technology can be a pain. I am not sure how people could connect with me. I am working on getting the computer fixed and trying to learn how to use the new phone. 

Fancy Nancy Says: Things can complex when your communication systems just don't work. It can be most frustrating.

title: Computers Can Be A Pain!
content:
My computer has been giving me some major problems. I called a computer tech and he came to the house and I paid him. Before he arrived aol put in without my request an updated program. After that happened nothing worked at all. I thought I would get rid of aol and so I called a computer techinician. 

He got the computer to work slowly, then after he left the computer was the slowest it has ever been. Every program was screwed up. I called him today to complain. 


Fancy Nancy Says: Computers can drive you crazy. I do need it, but there are times I am ready to throw it out the window.

title: New Phone is Confusing
content:
I just got a new phone and I need lessons to work it. What happened to the simple phones ? In the past all you did  was pick up the receiver and talk. No more!

Fancy Nancy Says: Things are too complex!

title: Working on New Program for the Library
content:
I am working on presenting a new program on retirement for the local library. I hoping to have an interesting panel of speakers who can share different aspects of retirment planning. The program is not unitl Aug. but I am booking the speakers now. I do like doing new programs. It is fun to interact with new people. 

It will be up to the library to promote the program. When you do a program you are always concerned that there will be an audience. Even though it is free, you never know who will show up. 

Fancy Nancy enjoys doing new projects. Meeting new people is fun.

title: Interesting Week at Lahey Clinic
content:
I spent several days at the wonderful Lahey Clinic. The procedures that they do and the staff are great. After you have a test done, once you see your doctor you get the results immediately. What a pleasure to see a hospital run so effeiciently. I am lucky to have some great doctors who have helped me with medical issues for many years. 


Fancy Nancy Says: With medical issues you should seek out the best doctors and best hosptials. In the long run it pays! Feeling well is a blessing.

title: Birthday Time is Fun
content:
I spent the morning on aol trying to get my computer to work properly. This was the third time this week that I contacted aol and it still has problems. I am considering getting rid of aol. I am not sure how to do it, so I think I will go to the computer company near me to see the details. 

The evening was a fun dinner with my son and his wife. Lots of nice phone calls during the day, since today was my birthday. 

Fancy Nancy Says: Enjoy each day as if it was your bithday. Why not! Connect with family and friends for their birthday. People will be happy to hear from you. I was very happy to hear from many on Facebook. That is the plus of Facebook.

title: Nice Birthday Wishes
content:
It is so nice to hear from friends and family at birthday time. Thanks to all for the good wishes. Tonight we will see a play and tomorrow we   will connect with family as well. Birthday time is fun. 

Fancy Nancy Says: Enjoy birthdays . Appreicate your birthday and remember others as well. They will be happy to hear from you.

title: The Sun is Back and a Nice Ride to Jamestown
content:
A beautiful sunny day after lots of cold weather. Tonight we took a ride to lovely  Jamestown. A very small beautiful town with a good ice cream palor. It was so pretty to see the boasts , the water , and the sun setting. 

Fancy Nancy Says: Appreiciate the scenery . Why not!

title: Delightful Day in Newport
content:
Finallly, the sun came out and we spent a lovely afternoon in Newport. We visited the new museum near Touro , and then we took a ride to see the Castle Inn. They Inn buiilt a lovely new outdoor cafe. We did not eat there instead we went to Newport Creamery for a frozen yogurt. The prices in the Creamery are much more realistic. 

Fancy Nancy Says: At elegant places you pay for the view.

title: Medical Appointments
content:
We seniors keep the doctors employed. Now that we are up north, it is time to visit all our doctors to update all our body parts. As we get older the body seems to require more repair jobs and more attention. Oh well, the doctors will have no recession. 

Fancy Nancy Says: All the doctors are our kids age now.

title: Wonderful Morning with My Son and Grandson, and Rufus the Dog
content:
