That meant that the signed letter would not be returned until at least a week, if then. No one had told this to Fancy Nancy. The President said that the bank wants the program, but the delay was due to the fact that the letter had to go to the main office in North Carolina.Fancy Nancy called the President and said that it was helpful to know what was happening. Fancy Nancy will continue preparing the list, since the restaurant reservation has been booked by the bank. The problem was that the President had not taken the time to update Fancy Nancy. The President was undergoing a change in staff and other complications. Fancy Nancy told the President that bank invitations would still be needed and as soon as the needed letter is signed the list will go to the bank so that someone in the bank can create the invitations and get them out.Fancy Nancy already has ten ladies who want to attend and so she will keep the seminar date booked and wait for the lawyers to finish their review.Communication is the name of the game. When dealing with businesses Fancy Nancy has learned that they are busy, but they often fail to communicate the facts, and as a result, this creates problems. The nice man who helped Fancy Nancy will now handle her account in the future, since her representative quit her job. The nice banker is one of the few in the bank who knows how to listen to the customer.Fancy Nancy says Listening to the Customer is Essential For Good Business

title: Alec Had a Great Lesson
content: Today I worked with Alec, age 9. He did a great job writing a story and using transitions. This is a tough concept for writers, but Alec seemed to get the idea on how to use this special words in his writing.I spoke with the bank  and told them if they did not want the program, I have other banks who would. They called me and said they want the program. I learned that the delay in signing my contract was due to the fact that they sent it to their lawyers to review. Time will tell, but I think it will take place. I already said that after the program we could consider at a later date setting up a Women's Investment group. I did this in Rhode Island, and it ran for many years.I have been very  busy , but loving all my jobs.Fancy Nancy looks forward to a day off on Sunday.

title: Teaching  My New Writing Class
content: My new writing class at the park has become most enjoyable. I am also doing tutoring with a delightful 9 year old boy. Today my students read their writing aloud, and we laughed and enjoyed the results. I will work with this group until April 28th.The program that I have planned with the bank is ready to go , but the bank has not signed my agreement yet. My guess is they said they wanted to do the program, but they are dragging their feet about signing my Letter of Agreement. I won't continue my work unless they sign. We may be at a standstill, but that is okay . There are lots of banks around and they all need new customers. If this bank won't sign, then I could market the program to another bank. I have done my work, and they need to recognize that banks are not volunteer organizations. Time will tell. In any case , it is always a learning situation for future programing.Fancy Nancy is learning to the art of negotiation.

title: The Sun Finally Arrives in Florida
content: Today was a lovely sunny day. It is about time. We have had the coldest winter this season. I dropped off a Letter of Agreement at the bank and as soon as they sign, I will give them a list for the new program I created called Women and Finance. I think women need more education on the subject. The bank will cover the cost of the lunch at a lovely restaurant and I will be the moderator for the program  I think it will be a go situation, but I need a signed agreement to confirm the details.I enjoyed playing tennis singles today with a lovely friend. The exercise is great. Tomorrow I do my tutoring with my fun 9 year old student. He is preparing to take the F-Cat test . I think he will do well.Fancy Nancy Loves Her Jobs.

title: Fun New Jobs!
content: The economy must be getting better. This week I now have some new teaching jobs. I also love tutoring a delightful young man aged 9. I will be facilitating a seminar for Regions Bank. It is called Women and Finance. I always enjoyed working with banks in Rhode Island and this will be the first time I am doing a bank program in Florida. I had the idea, and I met with the bank . Women really need more information about finance. The bank agreed, so we are offereing an interesting seminar, and I will be the moderator. I love doing these new programs.I also will be adding another section to my course, Writing Your Life Story. I am teaching it now to 13 delightful students, ages range from 60 up. They are all interesting to teach. I love the job. We added an additional section March 15th. They are all good writers and their stories are wonderful to read . What a fun job this is!It has been very busy setting up these new programs. With the cold Florida weather, teaching has kept me busy. No time for Fancy Nancy to get into trouble. Have fun and keep in touch.Fancy Nancy Loves Creating New Programs!

title: Writing Class Has Some Great Students
content: My new writing class at the Park has 4 wonderful students. Today they read their writing and the results were wonderful. One dentist wrote about his trip to Alaska, and he had a hilarious story about his ride on the local bus and the cast of characters he encountered en route.I had to meet the bank to discuss an idea I had for offering a seminar called Women and Finance. I met with the local President of the Regions Bank and she was lovely. I just submitted a proposal if I am to be involved. If they accept my proposal , I will do the work.We never discussed my fee, so I think that they thought I was volunteering my time. Since they are not a volunteer agency , I E-mail a summary of our meeting and suggested a plan with my fee. Time will tell if they are willing to hire me.I also heard from the place I play golf. They are meeting tomorrow to see if they want to offer a writing program next season. I would teach the program next season.It has been busy lately, and I am enjoying my teaching and also trying to carve out some free time as well.Fancy Nancy says: I do love teaching and creating new programs is fun.

title: A Busy Fun Day
content: This morning I had my Spanish class and the teacher is excellent. It really poured in the morning. Then by afternoon, the sun was out. Now, in the early evening it started to rain again. What an unusual Florida winter.I took care of taxes today, and handled some business affairs. Then when I got home I learned I have to meet tomorrow with the bank to present a new program called Women and Finance. I also teach in the morning, and usually go line dancing, but I don't think I will have time for the line dancing.I am trying to schedule some exercise each day. I was happy to be able to come to the gym this evening and do some exercise. My days are fun and full. I am enjoying teaching at two places and also tutoring.Fancy Nancy says, " If you work at what you enjoy, it will be fun to work" . PS You will probably be good at your work since you will enjoy doing it. Pick something you like to do for your job.

title: Sunday Funday
content: We finally got a lovely sunny day and I took a walk to the market and enjoyed watching Marty in a tennis match. I left before the end of the match and was surprised when we came home and told me he lost. He was winning while I was there.Evidently, he pulled a muscle on the tennis court ,so he could not run well. He said he will play again today, in spite of the problem. Hope he can do it, but I question if his body really needs a rest.I enjoyed having six for dinner and it was a full day and a fun time. I am learning that everyone has to decide what works best for himself , so I no longer tell people what I think they should do unless they ask me.Fancy Nancy says, " Don't give advice unless people ask for it" People don't like to be told what to do.

title: Teaching Is Fun
content: I am delighted to say that I now have students in both my new classes at the Park. Fleischmann's Park is owned by the city of Naples, and in addition to my new classes, it offers lots of classes for all ages. They even have a skateboard run for skateboard enthusiasts.Besides my classes, I am now doing tutoring. I have a delightful 9 year old boy, and I am helping him prepare for the Florida FCAT test. This week has been very full since I have to complete my taxes as well.I do not have to wonder how to use the time. In spite of cold weather, I have been busy teaching, which is fun.Today was full with line dancing at 9am, then a seminar at 10am and a business apt. at 1pm and a fun relaxing walk to the library and my favorite store, The Bargain Box. A very full day, but I enjoyed it.Fancy Nancy is Busy Teaching and Enjoying It.

title: FACEBOOK IS NEW TO ME
content: Today I met with my student from Argentina. Mario has helped me with Facebook. He is interesting and shares things about his country , Argentina. I enjoy talking with him.Today I went swimming for the first time in a long time. It finally got warmer. Tomorrow I will teach my new class at the Park. I have some interesting students this year. Teaching is fun.I am meeting lots of people on Facebook. Congratulations to my grandson Ben who has developed a new game on Facebook.Fancy Nancy Applauds Ben Smith and his new game.

title: Life Story Class Ended Today
content: Today I completed the first class that I taught at the Renaissance Academy. My students were delightful and I hope they will continue writing their life stories. It is always fun to have an opportunity to work with new and interesting students.I start to teach this course again  in March. Now, I have to finish up my taxes for 2009. I finally got the needed information that I have been waiting for.I enjoyed listening to a wonderful lecture and slides on Mars. The professor really knew his stuff ,and the slides were amazing. I suspect that since they seem to have some water on Mars, there may be some form of life as well. Time will tell.The courses at the Renaissance Academy that I have taken this year and in the past are very well done. It is nice to be able to teach there and also take courses as well.Fancy Nancy enjoys a lecture and slides on Mars.

title: Facebook is Fun
content: I am now on Facebook and I am learning how it works. Sometimes I am unable to click to respond. Other times it works. I don't know if there is a trick to responding.Today I played tennis in the morning and then I went to a lecture about Spinoza in the afternoon. The weather is improving in Florida. My daughter Lynn was so helpful . She always has good advice when I am trying to make a decision. Lynn is patient and understanding and she is an excellent listener. Congratulations to Lynn!!! Thanks!

title: Writing Class and the Bargain Box
content: This morning I attended writing class and shared some of my blog writing with the group. They are writing novels, so my writing is a bit different.It was finally a lovely ,sunny day, so I walked to my favorite store, the Bargain Box and bought a great pants outfit for $10. Then home to one of my other favorite activities--- a nice nap!Fancy Nancy enjoys a Saturday.

title: Line Dancing and Condo Looking
content: Today was interesting. In the morning I went to line dancing. The only setback was that I had lost my car keys, so Marty loaned me his key to my car. I enjoyed line dancing and then I visited three condos on the market right at the same place. The condos were amazing since they were all in good shape. The units are older, but I am looking to see if I might want to purchase one as an investment.It seems that the only time you can make a profit is if the condo market goes up in the future. Then on to lunch with a friend. After lunch the best thing happened, I actually found my car keys. Great! I was so happy to have them again.A nice afternoon walk to the market and then my favorite, a nap. Overall a good day for Fancy Nancy.Fancy Nancy is Happy to Find the Lost Car Keys

title: Writing Class and A Birthday Party
content: My writing class at the Park is working out. I enjoyed helping the students with their writing projects. I still need more students for Speed Reading , but with time some will arrive.It has been a real challenge to start a new program at a facility that never offered programs for the mind . They always had only programs for kids and programs for the body. I am happy that my program is working.This afternoon we had a unique birthday party . There were 60 folks who arrived. The unusual part was that the guests had to pay for their own dinners. They did have an acting group perform. I have never been to a birthday party where the guests paid for the dinner. Maybe this is a new style of entertaining. I found it very strange!Fancy Nancy Enjoys Her New Writing Class!

title: I Need Help on Facebook
content: I signed up for Facebook, but I can't figure out how to read if anyone sent me a message. How do I find my name etc. on the site. Can anyone give me instructions???? A confused Fancy NancyI enjoyed teaching my student today from Argentina. Mario is bright and he is on Facebook, but I don't know how to find his site. Help!!!!Fancy Nancy Needs Help With Facebook. Thanks!

title: Life Story Class and A Look at Another Condo
content: I enjoyed teaching my Life Story class. I have some lovely students. We have only one more week for this course and then in March I start to teach a new section.In the afternoon I had fun hitting tennis balls with my friend Ronnie. The weather finally got nicer so it was great to be outside enjoying a beautiful day.From tennis I went to see another condo at my golf course location. The person I called just left the door open , and told me to take a look . I did , and although the unit is older , it was clean and in good shape. I called the owner and and at first the husband said he would only sell at the list price. I told him that I was interested, but not at the list price.Not even ten minutes later his wife contacted me,and asked what I would bid. I gave her a low bid, and she said she would check the price of other units, and she would get back to me.I will wait for her reply by E-mail . In the meantime, I have my price limit in mind, and I would be interested only if they meet my price. Time will tell, but it is a challenge to negotiate.Fancy Nancy considers a real estate deal.

title: Valentine's Day Class Reunion 2010
content: Every year my former writing class has an annual Valentine's Day class reunion. This year was wonderful. I always have fun prizes and this year I asked everyone to think of what I could do with a bargain I bought at a consignment store to $3. It was a very long white silk piece of material that could be used as a drapery on a window. I asked everyone to suggest how I could use it. The funniest answers included the following:   1. Return it and get your money back 2. Use it to cover my plants in the cold weather  3. Use it for a Circque Soleil routine. 4. Dump it! 5. Have students sign it with their names.The winner got the huge white curtain to take it home to cover her plants. We had a lot of laughs with their ideas. They also told us what they were doing in writing since last year. They really enjoy these reunions, and I have fun seeing everyone as well. I ran this group called the Writing Workshop for 18 years.I then looked at a condo for sale at a nearby golf course. The place was a mess, and the renter in their now was a smoker. The bed was not made, the kitchen was filthy, and overall the condo was old. Even though the owner only wants $115,000, it would need to be repainted  and fixed up. The condo overlooks the golf course , and that is a plus. The owner is 84 years old, and he says he wants to sell since he has some medical issues. I gave him a Valentine's present for his wife. I do not think I will give him even a low offer to buy the place. It was fun to see it though.Fancy Nancy says Valentine's Day is fun and our annual class reunion.

title: Line Dancing and Speaking at a Hearing Meeting
content: This morning I went to another line dancing class that is held where I play my fun golf. There are about 20 ladies in the class. It seems that not many men enjoy line dancing.After that I attended a meeting of the Hearing Association and at the end of the meeting I mentioned my book HEARING LOSS AND WINNING SOLUTIONS. One lady who also used Dr. Lee my surgeon for my implant bought a copy. I also showed one of my canes and mentioned that a cane can be very helpful to those with hearing problems. Finally , I shared my idea of using an umbrella stroller as a protection when crossing the street. My stroller is such a help. I carry all my things in it, and it saves my back as well. They laughed when I told them for only $10 they could get one at CVS.Fancy Nancy Shares Ideas for Hearing Loss

title: Hurray! Students Arrived at my Writing Workshop
content: I was delighted today to have 4 students arrive at my writing class at the park. One was an intersting male dentist, and the others were ladies . I was thrilled to have an actual class. It does pay to market since the dentist learned about my class from a flyer that I put in the library where I go line dancing.I also made a connection with the bank and we will offer a program in April . The title of the program will be Women and Finance. Now I have to let 12 women know that they are invited to a free seminar on two separate dates. This beats waiting for the ladies group I belong to who said I could not offer anything until next season.When you deal with a ladies group you have to comply with their rules, even if it does not make good sense. I am better off planning my own programs. I seem to be good at getting things running and off the ground.This Sunday we have a class reunion for a writing class that I taught for 18 years. We meet each year on Valentine's Day to enjoy being together. It is a fun get together. I do enjoy my writing groups.Fancy Nancy Is Delighted That Her New Class Has Students!

title: Spanish Class, Tutoring, and Lunch
content: Today was a full fun day with Spanish class, lunch with a former student, and time with Mario my new student from Argentina.Last night we had my Spanish class teacher and her husband for dinner. It was a lovely evening. Today after class I met with a former writing student and we had a long lunch and exchanged ideas about plays that we are both writing.Later a delightful two hour time with Mario from Argentina. He taught me all about some excellent Spanish programs online. He is very smart and picks up languages very easily. It is so interesting learning about Cordorba , Argentina which is his home.Fancy Nancy says, " You can learn a great deal from your students"

title: Fancy Nancy Considers Attending A Conference
content: I just found out that in June the Hearing Association is having their annual conference in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. I have never attended a conference, but they said if I wish I could bring my book HEARING LOSS AND WINNING SOLUTIONS for distribution and sales.I need more information about the cost of the conference, but I am considering going. Time will tell.I started a new writing program at the place where I teach and I met some lovely fellow students. It is always fun to connect with others and enjoy new friendships. One student knows a lot about sewing. I have a new machine. She said she would help me with sewing, and I will help her with writing. Another nice bartering situation will take place.Fancy Nancy says, "It pays to barter your skills"

title: Fancy Nancy Considers A Hearing Conference
content: For many years I have belonged to a hearing association. Each year they have a conference, but I have never attended. I understand that this year the conference will be in Wisconsin. They are offering a discount for new conference attendees. Once I know the details I will condsider going. It is in June and time will tell. Fancy Nancy was told she could even bring her book HEARING LOSS AND WINNING SOLUTIONS.Fancy Nancy will review conference information.

title: Fancy Nancy May Rethink Volunteer Jobs
content: Recently I joined a women's organization. They do offer some excellent programs and there are many lovely women in the program. I said that I would do some volunteer programs next season and even offered to do one this season.The organization is run with a chain of command. Usually, when I do a program for pay, I go directly to the person in charge and make an agreement. Doing volunteer programs could be okay, but they present a different format.I will have to review whether I am willing to go through the hurdles of the chain of command when there is a different process and no pay. For the moment, I need to rethink what my priorities are. In the meantime , I will not make any final decisions about next season until I have more information for future planning.I do know that once you are dealing with committees of ladies, it can take a lot longer to accomplish your goals. Time will tell about my decision, but for now I will research other options.I was willing to put a program into effect this spring, but the powers that control the program did not want to agree. As a result, I might reconsider my offer regarding programs for next season. I am a person of action, and I don't know if I will be willing to deal with a chain of command for no pay. Perhaps I will look further for other options. In the meantime, I work today and never know if any students will arrive at the program I offer in the park. I need to write some news releases to increase the enrollment.Fancy Nancy Rethinks Course Volunteer Positions

title: Fancy Nancy Gets Two Offers
content: I am enjoying my teaching at two places. I also got an offer to write a blurb for a writer. This would entail reading the new book and then writing something for the back cover. I said I would do it. He would even pay me.A second person wants me to write a book with him, but I said I would teach him how to write his book himself. Time will tell what he decides. Although my classes are small, that is okay. I enjoy working with any students that show up.I have been interviewing some stockbrokers and I find most of them fail to listen and they are more concerned with speaking.Fancy Nancy says, " In business it is essential to LISTEN to the customer".

title: Hola! A Fun Spanish Class and Meeting with Mario
content: Today I enjoyed my Spanish class. I was happy to connect with Mario Pacheco from Argentina. We are meeting at the library so that he can learn English and I can learn more Spanish. This will help both of us. Mario works at Publix and he is in a travel and work program. Soon he will leave for Dubais and other adventures. Mario is 21, handsome, and very bright. I predict that he will succeed in life since he seems to have some excellent plans. He will be taking Italian lessons and then plans on working for an airline . It is so interesting  to talk with someone who speaks the Spanish language and knows the correct pronunciation. I still feel like I am in kindergarten when I try to talk to him in Spanish. His English is much better than my Spanish. In any case this should help both of us. My studies with Mario are separate from my Tues. morning   Spanish classes. I met him at the market. He helped me with my groceries.Fancy Nancy says bartering to help each other makes sense.

title: Every Day Is a New Adventure!
content: I was delighted to enjoy 6 lovely students today in Life Story Class. It is always fun to teach this course. Some of the students just signed up, so I am glad that we ran the class.What a delight to begin learning about their lives. New students have lots to share. I also had some other students stop by, and they may join the next session for this class in March.It was a fun day, in spite of lots of rain. In the afternoon I stopped at the bank and was able to successfully correct a banking problem.Fancy Nancy says " It pays to hang in there. Every day is a new adventure.

title: Florida Gulf Coast University Program
content: I found out yesterday that in spite of a low enrollment my Life Story course will start on Monday with a reduced rate of pay since only three students registered. I accepted the reduction, since I do want to teach there. It seems that economically, there are lots of job cuts even in  teaching.I enjoyed listening to a lecture this morning on Vietman, the 21st century. It was given by a professor from Florida Gulf Coast University. One benefit I do get there is that I can take some free lectures for certain programs. This professor's son married a girl from Vietnam, so he has visited the country three times. He said women are still second rate citizens there, and the family has a strong hold on all the members. Loyalty , conforming to family tradition, and respect for elders are essential. The individualism of the west is not encouraged. He really knew his subject .His son is back in the United States and he and his Vietnam wife are having a hard time finding employment. I do not think that the recession is over, even though Washington says it is. When people continue to lose jobs they have no money to spend. As a result, I think our economy has not yet recuperated. We still are having economic problems in the United States, and probably other countries are dealing with the same problems. We are a global economy. As a result most economic declines exist everywhere.Fancy Nancy is still out there marketing . She does have some new ideas for other programs.

title: Marketing Takes Work
content: Well, today I had only one student arrive, so after class I went next door for line dancing. Suddenly, I saw someone waving to me. As it turned out two others arrives at 11:15 and the class runs from 10-11am. They said they would come back next week even though I offered to leave dancing and do a lesson. I am putting in the time, but developing a student body takes work.The day improved as we had a lovely dinner with Bob , Wini, and Bunny at a new Italian Restaurant. Times are tough and it seems we are still in a recession. This new program so far is mostly a volunteer job.Fancy Nancy Finds It is Lots of Work to Promote a New Program.

title: Marketing Can Be a Full Time Job
content: Today I did some course marketing for my new courses at the Park. I just noticed that my courses will also need marketing for Florida Gulf Coast University. This year there are quite a few writing courses, and as a result, there are lots of available courses. It seems that marketing can be a full time job. I guess the lesson to be learned is for something to succeed, it really takes some work. Otherwise, you can't assume that people will automatically sign up. I guess it is a question of priorites.In any case this blog has been lots of fun and I am enjoying any and all responses from my readers. Keep me posted and thanks for your comments.Fancy Nancy is still doing marketing!

title: Fancy Nancy Markets Her Courses
content: Today I went to the center where I am offering two new courses. I gave out flyers to the bingo group and the Parkinson's exercise class. I even stayed and did some exercises with the group. I have been encouraging friends with medical issues to come to my class and write about what they are going through. Time will tell if this marketing will work. I also went to the large health club and suggested that they offer similar courses.My sister and her husband are in Florida so tonight they came to my house for dinner. We enjoyed the dinner and lots of laughs.Marketing is the key to getting the word out. Even if you have a great product you need to let others know about it.Fancy Nancy is out there pushing her courses.

title: Shop For Bank Rates
content: This week I had to do some banking. I have learned that it definitely pays to take the time to shop for the best bank rates. There is a definite difference in what the banks are offering. I have also learned that the different banks also have various rates depending on where you opened the account. If you call customer service they will ask you in what state is your account?The rules vary a great deal on renewing a new CD for your account. Some banks require more than a phone call to customer service. In addition, when you call the rates can vary from day to day. Sometimes you can even call the bank directly, and if  you like the rate they will let you lock in and then as soon as they get a check for the money, your new rate begins.This year since interest rates have been low, I have been going for the best rate, even if it is long term. You can always take a penalty if you wish to take your money out before it matures. Usually, if a new rate is two points higher than the rate you have, it may be worth it to cash in the lower rate CD.Learning about banks can be a full time job. In the long run, it does pay to take the time to do your homework. You are your best investor, and once you learn to do your homework, you will be the winner. No one cares more about your money than you!Fancy Nancy says do your homework, before you invest!

title: Writing and Tennis
content: Today I wrote a one page piece for my class I attend on Saturdays. I had listened to a tape and it gave me the idea . I used the word unstuck and talked about how to redirect your energies when things are not working. Perhaps I should have added the idea of changing your perspective on what  you are doing. If things do not work for you, maybe it is time to see things from a different point of view. It would be like looking at things sideways, backwards, and even upside down. You will definitely get a new perspective on your actions. There are times that everyone gets stuck. The trick is to get " unstuck". It does take time and patience.Also had a wonderful singles tennis game with a friend. I am enjoying playing singles. That way I won't have to play at the net. I just don't want to get hit  by a ball at the net. In any case my singles tennis is working out.Fancy Nancy encourages you to change your perspective !Try it.

title: Teaching Has Started
content: I have started teaching at one facility, and even though the class is small, I am enjoying it. The second class in Speed Reading has started, but so far no students. Next, I will have to do some marketing . On Monday , I just learned that have a senior group. I will attend and try to encourage some students to enroll. The price is a bargain. They only pay $5 whenever they attend. You can't beat the price.Both courses are excellent. Now the next thing is to market them. They have never offered any courses like these before, so it will take time. In the meantime, I used class time today to do my taxes.I do enjoy teaching so next I will have to do some marketing. In any case, I have met some nice folks who work there as well. One day at a time.The weather is finally much improved.Fancy Nancy has to start marketing her courses for the new facility.

title: Flexibility Is Essential
content: It seems that life changes are constant. Even  when we try to plan our schedules, situations beyond our control happen. I just got a call that a course I was to teach was canceled. I was disappointed, but now I will have a free Friday. A friend called to play some tennis, so if it works out, I will do that instead.It seems that plans change and the trick is not to get bent out of shape. Even though we may be upset at the time, perhaps it offers us an opportunity to use the time in a new way. I shall have to remember these words of wisdom. Writing about change seems to help us cope.Fancy Nancy says let me know how you handle change. RSVP

title: Cupons Make Good Sense and Save Money
content: In the past I never really used money-saving cupons. Marty is the master cupon saver. Well,  last week he gave me a 30% off cupon he found for my favorite bargain store. Today I just came back from The Bargain Box and guess what I bought! They had three sewing machines and I decided to buy one of them. I made the $40 investment for a Kenmore machine. Now I  have to bring it into the house to see if it really works. The sign on the machine said in working order, but one never knows until you try it.I am not a master at sewing machines, but in this case, I feel that the Bargain Box deserves the money . They are a church charity, and when you buy there, they put the money to good charitable use. I often drop off bags of used items I do not want. I also seem to find items that I need. I have used the Bargain Box for 25 years, and they used to have furniture as well. Needless to day, some of the items in my home came from this wonderful place.You too can save money if you find your local bargain place. The second hand shops are everywhere, and they seem to be doing better than the retail stores. I often say to Marty, the lovely jacket you see on someone in the fancy restaurant will probably be in the Bargain Box next season. Just wait and you may own it.Fancy Nancy enjoys a bargain!

title: Fancy Nancy Gets Humorous Checks
content: Today in the mail I got two checks from a bank that was updating their records for the year. The first check came along with a letter from the bank explaining their error. The second check had the same bank letter. When I looked at the amounts of the checks I had a good laugh.The first check was for one cent, and the second check was for eight cents. They will probably charge me for cashing such a small amount. No wonder the banks are in trouble.I was happy to feel better today, so I kept my normal schedule and took care of medical appointments. I also handled some financial matters. We are soon in tax season, so it is time to get organized for the accountant.Fancy Nancy Gets Two Bank checks for under 10 cents!

title: Power is Restored --- Hooray!!
content: Last night we finally got our power restored. I guess Florida is not used to the very cold weather we have been experiencing. I started my teaching yesterday . I have several students for my writing workshop, a new program that was never offered before at one of the local parks.Today I was to teach Speed Reading, but do to an expected bout of illness, I had to cancel. As it turned out, it was okay, since they did not have any students yet for that class.Time will tell if it will run. In any case , the writing program will continue. It is so nice to be able to use my computer again and have a phone. You become very dependent on technology, and when it does not work, it is difficult to let people know why you aren't responding.Tonight we have a movie club meeting,  and since the meeting is at my house, I decided not to cancel. I took some medication and I do feel better, so I should be okay for the meeting.Love to hear from you and Fancy Nancy says, "Keep in touch!"

title: Cold Weather Freezes Communication Lines
content: Well, yesterday we lost all communication services. The phone, computer and tv do not work. I am at a hotel using the computer since mine is dead. I guess the Florida power lines can't take the cold we are experiencing.This morning was my first day teaching at Fleischman's Park. I go dancing at the same place, and suggested that they add a writing course. The students only pay $5 and they can come as often as they wish. I was happy to have two students today, and they both said they would come back next week as well. Tomorrow I hope to have students for my Speed Reading at the same place. I do enjoy the teaching, and I hope others will soon attend as well.The sun is out today, so it will probably get a bit warmer. I just got approved to do a lecture for a program that just started last year at URI. If it fills then they may want more sessions in the fall. Time will tell. Hope our communication services soon get repaired. In the meantime, I am using the computer at a hotel.Fancy Nancy says cold weather freezes communication services at Comcast. Keep in touch.

title: Toilet Paper Blog Triggers New Facts!
content: My blog on toilet paper has led to some interesting facts from a reader. Here's what I learned. Scott Paper Company marketed the first rolls of toilet paper. The company was founded in 1879 by two brothers Irvin and Clarence Scott. In 1896 Irvin's son Arthur joined the company and convinced his father and uncle to have a private label business named Waldorf. In 1921 Waldorf represented 64% of Scott's total sales. By 1925 Scott became the leading toilet paper company in the world. In 1995, Scott was acquired by Kinberly Clark.So much more information is available about toilet paper. Maybe I should look into buying some shares, since  the product won't go out of style. It seems that the products we take for granted might be the very products we should invest in.Today was a social day. I invited 4 of my former writing workshop class members for lunch. We enjoy keeping in touch and each Valentine's Day we have a class reunion. I ran a Writing Workshop for 18 years before I started to teach for Florida Gulf Coast University, Learning in Retirement program. The project was great fun and several students in our class attended for the entire 18 years. We are all a bit older, but we all still enjoy writing.Fancy Nancy says maybe I should look into investing in toilet paper shares along with oranges. Keep in touch.

title: Saturday Writing Class and Toilet Paper
content: Today I went to my Saturday morning writing class. I do not teach this class but attend. We have a woman who facilitates the group and this morning in spite of cold and rain 16 people arrived.Usually our leader writes and shares her one page piece with all of us. We each have one word as a topic and then we write only one page and read it to the group. My one word today was new for the New Year. I encouraged the group to try something new and listed the new things I am doing.Our leader used two words, lost cause. She talked about how the size of the toilet paper roll has shrunk, but the price is the same or higher. She even brought in  the end of the roll with no paper on it and compared it to prior rolls. She said she could write to Congress about the shrinkage, but she felt it would be a lost cause. I thought the subject was a riot, and the class roared as she passed around old toilet paper samples.In my class we have snow birds from everywhere. We meet once a week and this group has been ongoing for at least five years . We previously met at the local library, but they are no longer open Sat. mornings. Now we meet at a local church and today we made a donation for the use of the room.The range of writing talent is wide, and even those who had no talent have improved greatly. It is fun to reconnect with the group even though we only see each other once a week. This class is what triggered the material for my book SNIPPETS.An update on Florida weather: Tonight it will be about 30 and they suggested we could have some snow. I am using all my winter clothes. Maybe it is a good time to invest in oranges. For sure the new crop will freeze.Fancy Nancy says , " Visit Florida , and pack your ski clothes. You will need them for sure!"

title: Dancing and Meeting
content: Today I went to a new line dancing class at my par 3 golf course. They said I could attend, so I paid my $3 and enjoyed a one hour class with about 20 others. This is the first time I went to this class. I also attend a different line dancing class on Wed.In the afternoon I was invited to a new member coffee sponsored by the Women's group I joined. There were 10 new members there and it was held in an area called Barefoot Beach. I had never been there before, but it was lovely. The condo overlooked the Gulf of Mexico. I learned today that this Women's Cultural Group sponsored by the Federation now has 370 members. I volunteered to do some programs for them next Dec. before I start my paid teaching. There was one guest who was 92 years old . She looked great and still travels, entertains , and lives alone. Some people definitely have the right genes.Overall, this was a fun day . It has been quite cold this week and we are due for more cold weather. I am now using my winter coat in Florida.Fancy Nancy meets 10 new ladies. If you meet one new person each day, at the end of a year you will know 325 people you never knew before. Try it!

title: Fun Tennis with Sun!
content: Today I played some fun tennis and would you believe the sun actually was out so we were not freezing. I played singles with a friend, since I no longer want to play net in a doubles game. I really enjoyed the fun tennis.Tomorrow I am due at a new members tea for this women's group that I joined. I could not find the address on mapquest, so I will be on to a new adventure trying to locate where it is being held.Next week I  start to teach and it will be interesting to see if any students arrive. Teaching for many programs is a last minute happening. The lesson one has to learn is flexiblity. If one thing does not work try another.Fancy Nancy says, " Be flexible and things will work out"

title: A Fun Day Even in the Cold
content: This morning I went to line dancing and I signed a contract to teach there if we get the students for a writing workshop and speed reading. Time will tell. They also have a handball court, so I hit some tennis balls.It was quite windy and cold, but I also hit a bucket of golf balls. I am trying to practice what my teacher taught me in my one lesson. I have a wonderful bargain shop, so I picked up new clubs at a very reasonable price. How does this sound--- I bought 8 clubs for $25. Now if they work all will be well. I am enjoying my golf and next week I even have a friend who will join me. Watch out Tiger Woods--- Fancy Nancy is on the golf spectrum.Fancy Nancy buys new golf clubs-- that have been used!!!

title: HOLA! Today was Spanish Class
content: Today was a fun Spanish class. Our teacher even taught in Mexico. She did not give us books, but we did some conversation and she wrote a lot on the board. There are about 16 women in the class. The teacher volunteers and once you join the Federation , for $60 you can take as many courses as you wish. A good filler while waiting to hear about my teaching.I also had a cold golf lesson. The teacher was excellent, but the temperature was cold and windy. I enjoyed learning what I am doing wrong and why my golf balls thud and don't fly. I booked another lesson since I need it.Overall a fun day in very windy Florida.Fancy Nancy says Adeios  . Keep in touch!

title: Keeping Cool in the Cold
content: Well, the weather in Florida is very cold, but I am sure it is better than where I am from, Rhode Island. A friend just wrote and told me it was 4 degrees there. I think I will stay in Florida for now.I am still waiting to hear if I will be teaching. I am booked at two facilities and possibly a third, but I won't know until enrollment occurs. In the meantime I am trying other things. Tomorrow I start Spanish and I even booked a golf lesson to help my lousy golf game.The best plan when waiting on jobs is to keep cool. Based on this weather , that is not hard to do. The economy has not really recovered, so jobs are not readily available. For those out of work, try to keep a balance in your life. Start a new course or volunteer until something locks in .Otherwise you could be too frustrated. Not always easy to maintain your emotional balance, but exercise will definitely help out.Fancy Nancy says, " It pays to keep cool"

title: Why Blogs Are Fun
content: I started my blog in Aug. and already I have had about 1200 hits. The best part is when the readers leave comments. It is wonderful to hear what they have to say . In addition, I have heard from some folks I never knew.I always wondered how a blog worked. There is a way to count the number of hits you get and a chart even shows you how many new visitors you have. Just like the stock market, the charts are plotted daily. I have enjoyed writing my blog and want to thank those of you how take the time to send me comments. Keep those comments coming. They are one of the best parts of a blog.What new things are you doing for the New Year? Let me hear from you.Fancy Nancy Thanks Her Readers

title: A Nice Visit With A Friend
content: Today we went to the East Coast of Florida to visit a dear friend from Rhode Island who is at her daughter's house. We used to be neighbors, and have remained friends in spite of the fact that we are now in Florida for six months each year.It was nice to see her daughter and two of her grandchildren. Everyone looks so grown up now. We are not getting older, but the kids sure are.We took a nice walk, but the weather felt like New England. It has been very cold here in Florida.This week I expect some company so it will be time to do some cooking. Also, Spanish begins on Tues. Keep in touch and love to hear your comments.Fancy Nancy Connects with a Friend

title: Golf Today-- Even the Ducks Were Hiding
content: Today I played golf at my fun par 3 course. When I go in the afternoon there is no waiting and often I am the only one on the course. I was amazed that they even let me take a hand cart and I do not have to pay anything.Normally, when I play the ducks are walking on the course. I guess they were too cold today since all the ducks had disappeared. Where does a duck go to keep warm? Do they have special hiding places or do they check into the local hotels? I never thought about that until today.We had a quiet New Years Eve. That is a good night to stay home. I will find out in January if any of my classes will run. In the meantime I have been hitting tennis balls with a friend, and playing my fun golf.This week I start Spanish again. It will be interesting to see if I remember anything from the  lessons I have taken with my daughter and grandson. I always have enjoyed classes with them. They are both bright and talented and the best part of the class is sharing time with them.For now Fancy Nancy says " Adeios   Have a Great New Year!

title: New Year's Day 2010
content: Hi and hope everyone has had a Happy New Year. Last post I asked everyone to write something about the word new. Have not heard from you, so I will begin.Well, I was thinking I might try to learn how to play chess. That would be new for me . My grandson is a whiz at the game, and I have never played. Perhaps if I go online and hit chess, I could begin to learn how to play. It would be fun to be able to play a game of chess with himI am also trying to learn more about golf. I got a book and it said women should put more time into putting, since that is a big part of the game. I have never read a book about golf, but I learned some good pointers.Trying something new is very stimulating. It is always a challenge and it is good for both the body and the mind. I have discovered that when others are no longer able to do something that have enjoyed, too often they are at a loss for something new to take its place. I have tennis friends that can't play tennis any longer, and at first they are sad since we all miss what we have enjoyed. Here are some fun things to try for the New  Year.     1. Chess 2. Line Dancing 3. A foreign language 4. A blog 5. Painting 6. Computer GamesI think I will go online now and try to find Chess to see what I can learn.Fancy Nancy says Happy New Year with a focus on the word New. Send me your comments.

title: I Now Have 100 Posts
content: I thought it would be fun for the New Year to have my readers add to the posts. I will introduce a word, and let's expand an idea from the one word. For example, I will use the word new. What is new in your life? What do you want to change for the new year? What is the newest fun thing your are doing? Lots of ideas from the one word new will make a fun  collarborative blog. I encourage you to add your ideas through the comment section after this blog. This will be a new experience for all of us. After you add your comment, hit anonymous then post the comment and you will help to create my new blog!Thanks for your help.Fancy Nancy Has A New Idea

title: Tennis and New Garbage Disposal
content: Today I had fun hitting tennis balls with a friend. I have not been doing any net tennis, but I still can hit and enjoy singles tennis with friends. It is good execise.Yes, I did need a new garbage disposal, so today the plumber put one in. Even applicances get sick. Hope this new one will work for a long time. I am enjoying my blog and wish everyone a Happy , Healthy , New Year. Love to hear from you on the comment section of this blog. Do try it out.Fancy Nancy Has Fun Tennis!

title: A Fun Movie
content: Today I saw a fun movie. "It is Complicated "with Meryl Streep is a delightful flick that will appeal to seniors today. It brings out issues that did not exist in past generations. Since we are living longer, many are entering a second adolescense. I made up a word for it, I call it your " Senior Essence". In any case the movie is fun and will give many a good laugh. For women the movie is uplifting. The star, Meryl Streep , is able to run a business, enjoy her family, and attract her ex-husband and her archeitect. Quite a new scene for the older female. Nancy Myers, the director, has a winner in this fun movie.

title: Fancy Nancy Hopes You Had A Nice Holiday
content: Well, Christmas was yesterday, and I hope everyone had a nice holiday. In the morning I wrote two new facilities about course proposals. I have no idea if either one will be interested, but it never hurts to send them information. I suggested that both places could offer one-stop exercising. This way folks could exercise and at the same facility they could take courses for the mind. ( Exercising the body and mind at one place makes sense.)The first place is a fancy golf course. Many of the members are getting older, so probably Writing Your Life Story would be a program of interest. The second place is a huge wellness center. I sent both facilities a list of four courses . My next step after they get the information , is to keep in touch and see if there is interest.Since I learned there is a time line on the insurance program, I decided to hold off for now. I don't want to get overbooked . Once I start my teaching I won't have time to work on insurance information. The man in charge was wonderful. He let me try the course and he did not even charge me for a short trial. It was online that I learned there is a 90 day time line. I would not have know this otherwise.It does pay to research before you buy something. Often there are details that are not advertised.Fancy Nancy says " Caveat Emptor"

title: More Research Needed
content: I have been trying the online insurance course, but I just learned that there is a time line to complete it. I do need more information about the details. If you pay to buy the program why do they only give you 90 days online? I think there may be problem there. I need to do more research.More computer printer is giving me a problem. I tried to cancel printing a file of 305 pages and when I hit cancel, the printer would not accept that command. So much for listening to the owner. There are days that the computer and the printer need to be disciplined. They both do not listen. I am now at a hotel . At least this computer is listening for now.Hope your computers are better behaved. Mine needs to be better trained.Happy Holidays.Fancy Nancy Needs More Research

title: Fancy Nancy Tests an Online Insurance Course
content: For a while now, I have been thinking about getting certified to sell long-term care insurance. I just found out that I can take the required course online, and that would save going to another city to take the program. It is not offered where I live. The school that is offering the best price is located in Delray Beach , Florida.The next few days that are allowing me to try it online. They also send you a book that goes along with the course. Have any of you taken any courses online? If my computer works , it would make it easier than commuting to another city. Let me hear your thoughts!Fancy Nancy considers taking an insurance course online.

title: Fancy Nancy May Have Found A Cell Phone
content: Today Marty got a new cell phone from Verizon and I tried it. I could actually hear on it. What a surprise. His nephew sells them and Marty will contact his nephew in Colorado to find out the price details. In the meantime I can go to a Verizon store here in Florida to test the phone . I am amazed that I could hear on his new phone.Fancy Nancy had a nice lunch with a friend and then tonight we went to Barnes and Noble. It is surprising that this store has many chairs and people just sit and read the new books, and never buy them. It is no surprise that the bookstores are not making money. I guess they have not figured out that they should remove the chairs for more book sales. Perhaps the next book out should be called, " Bookstores sales tips-- remove comfortable chairs for more actual sales".Fancy Nancy Gives Bookstores A New Sales Tip

title: New Teaching Possibilties
content: Today I visited a different golf course. Although the prices were out of sight, I did suggest that for their members they might want to offer a Life Story course. They told me to send them more information, and they would review it. Most of the members are 70 and over, so Life Story writing might be appropriate.After that I went to exercise at a wellness center. I also suggested to them that they offer courses for the mind as well as the body. They also want to see more information.Both places offer possiblities for teaching. I just need to discover how much time I will have since I am already booked at two facilities. It will depend upon enrollment. If enrollment does not come in, then I would be looking for places to teach. I will probably send proposals to both facitlites to make a connection.When I left this morning for my golf club appointment to learn about this club I never thought that I would end up perhaps working for them. Who knows what will happen, but it is always fun to make new connections. The course that I visited wants $100,000 non-refundable initiation fee. Perhaps their members could afford a writing course as well.Upon review the course deals are everywhere, but the prices even for the deals run $5,000 and up. Wow, golf can be an expensive proposition.For now Fancy Nancy will play her short , inexpensive course. Tennis is much cheaper. It is fun to learn about all the courses in our area. I am meeting lots of membership directors. It seems that many of the golf clubs will have a tough time with the recession. Some folks want to resign, but are unable to until they get new membership.

title: Fancy Nancy Attends A Workshop
content: Today Fancy Nancy attended a morning workshop about women in retirement. There were about 10 interesting women, but the meeting was a bit short. It would have been nice to learn more about each woman. This series is part of a Federation cultural program that Fancy Nancy has joined. Until she knows what courses will run, Fancy Nancy is doing other things besides teaching. She does hope her classes will get enrollment.After the meeting she visited a huge hotel and golf course called Tiburon. They hold major golf events there and she had not seen how large the course was. It was very cold , so she had a quick tour, heard their prices and decided to move on.Fancy Nancy still likes her par 3 $15 course the best. This week she will take a friend there for lunch and see if her friend wants to join her for golf at some time. Fancy Nancy wishes everyone Happy Holidays and love to hear from you.Fancy Nancy joins a Women's Cultural Group

title: FANCY NANCY HAS AN ATHLETIC DAY
content: Today it was quite cool. Fancy Nancy had a fun time hitting some tennis balls with Marty. She had not played tennis in a long time. She will not longer play net, but still can enjoy hitting . She must avoid being hit, so net tennis is out.She also did some golf  at her par 3 golf course. No baby carriage today, but a golf cart. They did not even charge for the use of their cart. Fancy Nancy walked the course with the ducks. One of the ducks was in the path of the ball and he quickly left the course after he collided with the ball. I hope he is okay. He seemed to realize that it  was time  to relocate.Fancy Nancy had a fun weekend with theater one night and good pizza the next. Her cousin visited her today and told her she enjoyed reading SNIPPETS. Fancy Nancy now has some extra copies for anyone who might need one. Happy Holidays and she looks forward to seeing her family this weekend.Fancy Nancy becomes a jock!

title: Fancy Nancy Goes to Writing Class
content: Today Fancy Nancy went to writing class and shared some information about my blog. My class has enjoyed the Fancy Nancy stories, and suggested I start a new book, The Adventures of Fancy Nancy. I will think about it, and before I do anything I will go online to see if there is already a children's book with that same title.Ofcourse even if there is, the writing rules say that you can not copyright a title, so Fancy Nancy 's Adventures would still be possible. It seems that Fancy Nancy often gets into trouble, and my job is to help her out. What do you readers think about a book about Fancy Nancy's adventures? Love to hear from you. In the meantime enjoy the holidays and relax if you can.Fancy Nancy considers writing about more future adventures.

title: THE COPY MACHINE CAPER
content: Last week I used the library copy machine and ran off some yellow flyers for my courses. I used my own yellow paper not realizing that the copy police would be upset. Today the library informed me that I have violated the copy rules and only their white paper can be used. Fancy Nancy shall make a library donation next week to keep them friendly. So much for the copy machine caper. I never knew you can't use your own colored paper in their machine. Too many rules to learn in this world today!Tonight we saw a fun play called Naples City Imrov. Players performed a series of games that were unscripted and based on some game show. The cast was amatuer, but very talented. A fun evening.Fancy Nancy learned today that her golf partner the other  day is the club champion. No wonder her balls soared as mine plopped on the turf. I had no idea when invited that she is the best lady player at that club. She had contacted me to enourage new membership. All the clubs are looking for new members and are happy to let you try their golf course. What a deal!Fancy Nancy will have to take a Follow the Rules Course in 2010.

title: More Copies of SNIPPETS are Being Printed
content: Today I just ordered 10 more copies of my book SNIPPETS. I have received many nice comments from my readers, and I thank you for replying. It seems my readers have enjoyed the short , snappy, stories in the book.As a result, I have decided to print some extra copies in case any readers might want to order one for a gift for the holidays. The new copies will be ready on Saturday, and I could ship any order immediately so you would have the book before the holiday. Let me know your needs . I thank you for your kind comments. I am glad you have enjoyed reading the book. I know I had fun writing the stories. The book is 55 pages and most of the stories are one or two pages. They provide a quick read. Have a happy time getting ready for Xmas and the New Year. My Best Wishes to all!FANCY NANCY ORDERS NEW COPIES OF HER BOOK SNIPPETS

title: Captionsbest Hits Go Over 1000
content: How exciting. Today my blogspot count hit over 1000. I don't know all the folks who have seen it, but it was fun to learn that some are reading it. I am at a hotel now using the computer since my computer has problems with certain sites. I appreciate getting comments on the blog, and all you have to do is write your thoughts in the comment box. Then next to comments scroll down and find the category called anonymous and last hit post comment. It is lots of fun to read your comments. Fancy Nancy enjoys what you have to say as well. Enjoy the holidays and keep posting and Nancy will keep blogging.FANCY NANCY HITS GO UP!!! WOW ! AND THANKS.

title: A Lovely Golf Day With a Great Golfer
content: Today was a fun day. I was invited by a wonderful golfer to try a country club here in Naples. Her golf was unbelievable and she was a charming lady. We used a golf cart which makes 9 holes much faster than walking. She would hit the ball and it would soar into the air. Her first name is Marcha and it was a delight to play with a real golfer.My balls plodded along, and she was so patient as she waited for me to catch up. She is one of the best woman players I have met, and a delightful lady as well. Many thanks to Marcha for all her kindness.Fancy Nancy Enjoys A Golf Game with a Fantastic Player!

title: REINVENTING YOURSELF
content: Fancy Nancy has had some fun trying out new things. First it was golf. Next, I am trying massage from some new places. I am limiting my tennis to hitting against a handball court. I don't want to chance playing the net and getting hit with a tennis ball. I signed up for bridge once a month with Marty and just joined a group that is offering Spanish once a week. For the moment I do not know my teaching schedule, but I am filling the time with other activities. I do hope the teaching comes through in January, but for now I am keeping busy . It does pay to reinvent yourself from time to time . Trying new things opens up new possiblities.FANCY NANCY OPENS NEW DOORS!

title: Fun Day With Friends
content: Today we had a nice breakfast at the First Watch with friends. Tonight we played bridge with different friends who are our neighbors. A fun day . Fancy Nancy had booked a massage, but it was cancelled. In my instructions to post a comment remember after you push anonymous, then you have to push post comment. Hope to hear from you.Fancy Nancy's Fun Sunday.

title: BABY STROLLER STIRS GOLF RULES
content: Today I played golf on my par three empty course. Again, when I began there was no one else on the green. Suddenly, I saw the man from the pro shop behind me. He said he was getting calls about a baby carriage on the course. Then the head of the rules committee arrived. Well, to make a long story short, no more baby carriage on their course.Folks who were nowhere to be seen must be watching from their condos. They must have nothing better to do. I gave them some excitement for today. They should only know about my new golf rules. Mum is the word!Fancy Nancy's Baby Carriage Gets Evicted!

title: NEW BANK RULES
content: I guess the banks are trying to make money in new ways. It seems that they want to charge for everything. Today, I wanted to open a new checking account. No more senior free checking accounts. Every checking account charged you fees. Well, I thought how about a savings account? I checked that out and indeed you had to put in $200 and you got .05 interest. What a deal for the bank, not for the customer. Check out your bank and note the new fees. We bailed them out, and now they are charging us for everything. Something is wrong with the system. We should be charging them for the taxpayers money  that we loaned them.I got about 10 pages of rules and information. Perhaps if they simplified the rules they would save money on all the paper and they could remove some of the customer fees. Check out your bank and note the new fees!Fancy Nancy Reviews Banking Fees!

title: FANCY NANCY'S NEW GOLF RULES
content: I enjoy my golf because of my new golf rules.     1. Never do water, just pick up the ball and try again from dry land.     2. Never do sand traps, you will get sand in your shoes.     3. If you are tired , don't finish. Go home and take a nice nap.     4. If you play alone, you can follow the rules.     5. Never keep score, it is the nice walk that really counts.     6. Never lose a ball, they cost money.     7. Don't enter a golf tournament, they will throw you out.    8. Invite any guests who are willing to follow the New Golf RulesWant to join me for golf???? No competition is required!Fancy Nancy lists the New Golf Rules

title: HOORAY- FOR ANONYMOUS
content: I finally figured out how to let folks give comments and publish them. Now I know to tell them to print their comment and when  they hit the button to select how they comment, by choosing anonymous, and posting the  comment it should register. I just added the anonymous since I did not know it was missing and I just learned how to find it.Blogging is like learning a new language. Unless you use it, you can easily forget what you have to do. I sent an E-mail to my teacher Lori, and she is so helpful. She gave me the missing clue on how to find the anonymous category for visitors to make comments. Hope to hear from you all soon. Love to get your comments.Fancy Nancy adds Anonymous to the comment category for all her visitors. Try it! It is at the end of the list of choices.

title: Nine Holes and Two Ducks
content: Yesterday I played golf at my bargain course. I was amazed that I had a private course. No one was on the course except Fancy Nancy and two ducks. Wow, I never had a private golf course before. I took my four clubs , placed them in my umbrella stroller and enjoyed another fun afternoon of golf.Today was exciting. I went with a friend to a movie at the office of the Federation. About one hour into the film flashing lights and loud sounds started blaring. All I know is, everyone left the building and the fire trucks were on their way. Needless to say, we did not return to see the end of the movie, but the flick was not very good anyway. So much for today's excitement. Then I got home, and Marty said he backed up at the tennis court and hit a car. Fortunately, no one was hurt. Tonight I called my insurance company. I was lucky that several years ago I put him on my auto insurance policies. The insurance company will cover any damage to the other car, and other than a few scratches, my old car is fine.Each new day is a new adventure! Fancy Nancy moves on!

title: A Simple Formula for the New Year
content: Fancy Nancy has a simple formula for each new day. Do something to exercise your mind and your body, and do something for someone else. This easy plan works extremely well, and if you follow it, each day will be productive and fun.Fancy Nancy will begin teaching in January, and her courses at two facilities include the plan: Writing Workshop, Speed Reading, Life Story - all for the mind. In addition she will run a Diet Writing course for the body. She loves to work with new students, and hopes both places will get enrollment. In the meantime, think about her formula for your New Year. It really works and makes for a great day!Fancy Nancy describes a plan for the New Year!

title: A Blog Is So Much Fun
content: Fancy Nancy enjoys her blog. She started it in August and she now has had 720 hits on her blog. She enjoys writing for the blog, and loves it when her readers send comments. What fun to see each day how many people have taken some time to check out her blog.For those who have never tried it, go online to blogspot.com and they will give you the rules. You can even put ads on your blog if you wish. I do not put ads on , but I do want to learn how to put pictures on . No pens or pencils are needed for this fun activity. Create a fun name for yourself, and explore new ideas, new worlds and before long you will become a blogmaster!Fancy Nancy Has Fun Blogging!

title: Fancy Nancy Announces Her Other Projects
content: Fancy Nancy was happy to get some requests for SNIPPETS,  her recent book. Just in case others want a neat holiday gift Fancy Nancy has created other items for fun and education.    Her first book is called HEARING LOSS AND WINNING SOLUTIONS.  It is available by contacting Fancy Nancy . It sells for $10 plus the shipping. She also makes creative canes that help folks using canes have more fun. She has done colorful creative canes with all kinds of items: Ex. A piano cane, a golf cane, a mahjong cane, a logo cane, you name it, and she will create it. If I learn how to put pictures on my blog, then I could show you some of my canes. People love them and the good part is, no one says , " Why are you using a cane?" Instead they say, " Where did you get that cane?"Fancy Nancy's canes have been written up in newspapers and craft magazines. She is so happy when people enjoy them. The creative canes can match any outfit, and she even did one for a bride . The cane matched the bride's outfit perfectly.So, if you want a creative gift for the holidays, whether it is a cane, a book, or a special holiday story or greeting, please contact Fancy Nancy at Nshu4@aol.com.Love to hear from you.Fancy Nancy Announces Unique Holiday Gifts!

title: Fancy Nancy Finds A Bargain Golf Course
content: Today I was so happy to discover a par 3 golf course in Naples, Florida that I could walk. This is really a find, since most of the courses insist that you take a golf cart.Well, Fancy Nancy paid her $15 and with her umbrella stroller baby carriage, she walked the 9 holes. No scores needed for her. Even water is no problem as she carries the ball past all obstacles. Since she had no partners, playing was a breeze. The best part is the walk and the price. Wow, was she happy to discover this convenient course nearby.Evidently the golf course has been here for many years, but this is the first year that Fancy Nancy found it. Up until this year, Nancy played more tennis. Now, to play it safe, she is limiting the tennis and turning to another sport. Hooray for the discovery of inexpensive golf that lets you walk the course even with a baby carriage. Even Tiger Woods can't top that!Fancy Nancy Finds Cheap Golf in Naples! A Miracle Happens !

title: Gift Certificates May Not Be Safe
content: I sent my son a gift certifcate in the mail over 10 days ago. Since there is no name on the cerificate, anyone can cash it. So far he has not gotten it. Even though gift certicates are convenient, they may not be the best gift. I will wait a bit longer, but the odds are it will never arrive.I should have learned a lesson in the past. This is the second time a gift certicate was lost. Several years ago, the same thing happened. Fancy Nancy did not learn from her first mistake, so perhaps this time she will not repeat the same mistake again.I guess the mails can't be trusted. Too bad, but it is true. Well, my intention was good, but so far the result was poor.Fancy Nancy warns you about mailing gift certificates.

title: Posting A Signature on My Blog
content: I am learning how to post a signature on my E-mails so that others will have the blog address. My grandson Ben gave me a clue on how to do it. Thanks, Ben! Now I have to figure out how to edit it so that I will have a captial C on the word check which shows the following: Check out my blog. I could not figure out how to get the C.Every day is a learning day with a blog. Today I met my cousin for lunch and shared with her the fact that my dad whose name is Ben has his picture with  the entire family in a restaurant named Ben. The picture is part of the wallpaper, and the pattern repeats itself. What a surprise to eat there and see pictures of my entire family. The restaurant is located in Delray Beach , Florida. In the picture is my grandmother, grandfather and all my aunts and uncles. Boy was I amazed to see it on the wallpaper. Life does have its surprises.Fancy Nancy Finds a Surprise

title: Finding New Jobs
content: Today I left materials at the recreation center where I line dance. I put in two course proposals for teaching there. I will still teach at the Renaissance Academy as well. This way whatever courses come through, will be fine for my teaching needs. Most courses are based on enrollment, but at the recreation center I made it simple. Students can attend as often as they wish and they only have to pay a small fee for that class. I used the same terms that work for line dancing. In Florida most folks don't want long range plans, since they often have company or they are here only briefly. Time will tell if this works, but it is always fun to try. I do love a new adventure.Hope everyone enjoyed Thanksgiving. We had a fun, relaxing time with two guests. It was easy, and they stayed until 7pm, so I guess they really enjoyed the day. Keep in touch and I love hearing your comments.Fancy Nancy Reflects on the Holiday!

title: HOLIDAY GREETINGS TO ALL
content: I was thrilled to hear from many of you with comments on my blog. For those who wanted copies of my book, I have now run off some more, so let me know what you want. We enjoyed friends at our house for a lovely relaxing afternoon lunch. They just left at 7pm tonight.I may be teaching again in January at two places. I will again teach several courses for Florida Gulf Coast University, but I might start some new programs for a local recreation center where I do my line dancing. They have never offered some of the courses that I teach, so I will see if there is interest. In Florida people are transient. I will offer two workshops where students can pay a small fee for each class with no committment beyond the day. We will see if it works. In the meantime, we have gotten settled and I have been updating our address with local accounts. When you relocate there are always mail issues . Do keep in touch and I love hearing from everyone. Enjoy the holidays and relax if you can.Fancy Nancy  sends Holiday Greetings!

title: HAPPY THANKSGIVING TO ALL
content: We are nearly at Thanksgiving and now it is time to write about what we are thankful for:   Good Health, Great Family, Good Friends, Good Times. These are some of the things we appreciate at this time of year.I always enjoyed this holiday. In the past it was at my home where we filled our house with lots of guests. More recently, we have celebrated the holiday on a different date so that everyone could be there.This year our kids are in our thougts since everyone is at a different location. We are thinking of everyone and wish you all Happy Thanksgiving and we are so happy you are in our lives.Love from Fancy Nancy and Marty

title: Technology Frustration
content: I had hoped in Florida we would not have technology problems. I was wrong.First, the phone did not work. We got that corrected. Now my computer will not bring in some programs.I tried to contact AOL by phone and by computer. Nothing worked so far. In desperation I have now looked up their mailing address. I may just have to write to them. AOL is impossible. I would cancel them, but this address is my only stable address and I would not know what other system to use. Anyone have any suggestions?Well what did we do before the age of technology? We wrote letters. I guess I may be reduced to writing a letter to a technology company asking how to connect with them? They are a major frustration. I love my blog and it allows me to vent. Thanks for listening.Fancy Nancy vents over technology problems!

title: Papa Ben at Ben's Restaurant
content: The most amazing thing happened this weekend. We visited my daughter on the east coast of Florida. She brought us to a delicious restaurant where the food was great. Well the name of the restaurant is Ben's .Now my dad's name was Ben as well. Shortly after we arrived she suggested that I look up near the ceiling. What I saw was unbelievable! My dad's entire family was in a picture . He was maybe eight years old. I had seen the picture in a book written by Mandy Patimkin. How the restaurant got the picture is a real puzzle. I shall probably write to them to find out.My aunt donated many pictures to the Conn. Historical Society. I think that is how the picture was in a book about families arriving in the United States.Well in addition to having a great weekend with my family, this was really a surprise.Fancy Nancy reconnects with her dad and his family.

title: My Florida Computer Works
content: We just arrived in Florida. When we left Rhode Island all technology was broken. The television did not work, the phone was gone , and the computer would not bring in any E-mails. I gave up and we left.We just arrived in Florida and at first we had to get the phone fixed. They will arrive again on Monday since only one phone got repaired. I do now have a computer and even though my Rhode Island computer never allowed me to edit my blogs, this computer seems like it will let me do edits. Wow, the world of technology is amazing! I don't think I will ever understand what goes on. In any case I am happy to have a way to communicate . I thank all my readers for hanging in. Fancy Nancy is onto more blogs from Florida. Keep in touch.Fancy Nancy arrives in Florida

title: Readers, I need your help
content: I was delighted to get  a request from a person who reads my blog. I need your E-mail to respond. Yes, you can have a copy of SNIPPETS.  I tried to reply on your blog, but I could not get my comment accepted.If you wish a copy I would run off an additional one. My cost is $10 plus it costs $5 to ship it. Do you still want a copy? If so, send me your full E-mail address, and I will give you the details. We are now in Florida , so I will forward my Florida address to you when I get your reply. Many thanks for reading my blog. Fancy Nancy

title: Library Computer Works Best
content: I am at the library because my computer is not working properly. In addition yesterday our phone did not work and the television went. We are leaving in several days. As a result, the only thing that got fixed was the phone.We have had constant problems with Cox. Too bad there are not great alternatives. The communication companies both here and in Florida are bad. Luckily Marty has a cell phone, so when all else fails, he calls to report no service.This too will pass, but if you don't hear from me, we will be enroute to Florida. I will try to find hotel computers along the way.Fancy Nancy Gets Ready to Relocate!

title: Medicare Confusion
content: Each year in November it is time to renew our prescription plans. The plans change, and the prices go up. I recently met with a counselor at the senior center and she said I need to research and find another plan.I just sent the information to my medical claims service to ask their advice. To confer with others we have to wait until Nov. 15th when more information will be available. It seems that our medical policies are getting the taxes, confiusing and necessary. Who knows what Obama's new plans will be?I am sure that others have the same confusion. Well, I shall go online and try to figure it out. One day at a time.Fancy Nancy tries to pick a medical plan.

title: Lucky Me!
content: I got the nicest E-mail from Andrew. He has a Nov. birthday, and I painted a picture of him and he seemed to like it. It is such fun to know that your creative efforts are appreciated. This is birthday month so to all the Nov. birthdays :    Happy Birthday Lynn, Andrew, Wini, Marty, Jane, and Deb. We wish you all good times, good health and a wonderful year!Fancy Nancy celebrates November birthday month!

title: Betsy and Richard Stories
content: I don't know how they do it, but Betsy and Richard must know just about everyone in New York. Each weekend they invite friends and family to share their apt . and their ski house. By the end of each season they have entertained over one hundred guests.
